GSP31iskamatu:4: nato 'smi parayā bhaktyā kāpilaṃ jyotir īśvaram // 1 //

GSP31iskamatu:17: sa tena guṇapuruṣāntaropalabdhirūpeṇa jñānenāpārapāraṃ didarśiṣayā hastāvalambeneva,

GSP31iskamatu:26: avagatya brahmopadeśavidyayā atandrito bhūtvā vācam ity uvāca --- “bho bho āsure3
GSP31iskamatu:29: sa evam ukto munir īṣadaniṣpannavivekavairāgyo 'yam iti vyavasya nirgamya bhūyo 'pi
GSP31iskamatu:30: dvitīye varṣasahasre pūrṇe pratyāgatya tathaivābhyuvāca --- “bho bho āsure3 ramase
GSP31iskamatu:33: athāsau mahāyogīndras tathaiva nirgamya tṛtīye varṣasahasre sampūrṇe abhyetyovāca --- “bho bho āsure3 ramase gṛhasthadharmeṇa” iti /

GSP31iskamatu:38: so 'bravīt --- “bhagavan bāḍhaṃ śakto 'haṃ bhagavatām ādeśam anugantum” iti /
GSP31iskamatu:39: sa evaṃ gṛhasthadharmam apahāya putradārādikaṃ ca,
GSP31iskamatu:40: pravrajito bhagavataḥ kila kapilācāryasya yoginaḥ prāṇāḥ(?)
GSP31iskamatu:42: tatra yadi kaścid evaṃ brūyāt --- kuto 'sya jijñāsā samutpannā yayāsau gurukulam abhigata iti /

GSP31iskamatu:49: “tat tapaḥ sa japaḥ sā dhīs taj jñānaṃ sā ca vaiduṣī /
GSP31iskamatu:53: ihopapattir mama kena karmaṇā kva ca prayātavyam ito bhavād iti /
GSP31iskamatu:54: vicāraṇā yasya na jāyate kṣitau kathaṃ sa dharmapravaṇo bhaviṣyati //
GSP31iskamatu:55: tasmāt samīcīnam idaṃ yad asyetijijñāsā samudapādi /
GSP31iskamatu:62: tatra śārīraṃ vātapittaśleṣmaṇāṃ dehadhātūnāṃ vaiṣamyād yad duḥkham ātmānaṃ deham adhikṛtya jvarātīsārādi pravartate /
GSP31iskamatu:65: ādhibhautikaṃ tu bhūtāny adhikṛtya yat pravartate mānuṣapaśupakṣisarīsṛpasthāvaranimittam /
GSP31iskamatu:66: ādhidaivikaṃ tu divam adhikṛtya yat pravartate śītoṣṇavātavarṣādikam /
GSP31iskamatu:67: evam etais tribhir duḥkhair abhihatasyāsurisagotrasya brāhmaṇasya jijñāsā samutpannā /
GSP31iskamatu:70: teṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ duḥkhānām abhighātako vināśako yo 'sau hetus tatra /
GSP31iskamatu:73: āhosvit tadvyatirikto 'sti kaścid anyaḥ puruṣo yasyemāni trīṇi duḥkhāni jāyante,
GSP31iskamatu:78: vṛścikādidaṣṭa eva viṣapratīkārāya jāṅgulikaṃ gaveṣayati no vā viṣabhavapīḍāsahaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:79: evam asahyaduḥkhābhibhūtasyāsures tadabhighātake hetau jijñāsā samutpannā /
GSP31iskamatu:80: sa ca samutpannaduḥkhābhāvaṃ jijñāsus tatpratīkārakuśalaṃ bhagavantaṃ kapilācāryaṃ śaraṇam abhyupagataḥ,
GSP31iskamatu:82: nanu duḥkhebhya eva jijñāsā samutpannā kathaṃ teṣām evābhāvāya kāraṇatvam upayāti /
GSP31iskamatu:83: na hi janayitrīsakāśād utpannas tanayas tasyā eva vyāpādanaṃ kurute /
GSP31iskamatu:85: iha loke yady asmād utpadyate tat tasyāpi vipattikāraṇaṃ dṛśyate /
GSP31iskamatu:86: yathā karkaṭako 'śvataro vā janayitryāḥ samutpannas tām eva vyāpādayati /
GSP31iskamatu:87: yad vā yathā kaścid āśīviṣaḥ śuṣkatṛṇabahulapradeśe sthitaḥ pratisarpaṃ dṛṣṭvā kruddhas tasya mukhaniḥśvāsanirgato vahnis tṛṇāni taṃ vāpi sarpaṃ dadāha /
GSP31iskamatu:88: amunā nyāyena duḥkhebhya eva jijñāsā niṣpannā duḥkhānām evābhāvaṃ kariṣyatīty arthasaṅgatiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:90: ced ity ayaṃ nipātaḥ śaṅkāyāṃ vartate /

GSP31iskamatu:95: mānasasyādhyātmikatāpasya pratīkāraḥ priyavastusaṃyogād apriyasya dūrataḥ pariharaṇāc ca /

GSP31iskamatu:115: punar dāhaḥ samutpannaḥ punar jātaś ca vepathuḥ /

GSP31iskamatu:119: pṛcchanti bālabhiṣajaṃ kathaṃ te dārakā mṛtāḥ //
GSP31iskamatu:120: kiñ ca nāsti samyagdhātuparijñānanipuṇatayā bhaiṣajyam / tathā hi ---

GSP31iskamatu:132: evaṃ mānasasyāpi śabdādipriyasaṃyogād api kadācin na nivṛttiḥ /

GSP31iskamatu:142: guruṇoktaṃ paścād vedaṃ śṛṇvanti śiṣyā ity anuśravo vedaḥ /

GSP31iskamatu:151: “apāma somam amṛtā abhūmāganma jyotir avidāma devān /
GSP31iskamatu:152: kiṃ nūnam asmān kṛṇavad arātiḥ kim u dhūrtir amṛta martyasya” //
GSP31iskamatu:154: iha --- śrutāv aikāntikam ātyantikaṃ ca phalaṃ śrūyate /
GSP31iskamatu:156: kadācit kilendro devān upasthitān niśamya ity avocat --- bho bho devatvād anyad api kim apy asti sukham /

GSP31iskamatu:164: tatas te ūcuḥ --- anena hetunā apāma pītavantaḥ /

GSP31iskamatu:169: asmin svarge iyanto devā iti vidmaḥ /

GSP31iskamatu:187: tad evaṃ vedavacasā bahūn piṇḍān paraḥśatān aśnāti yāvad eko 'pi putro na jāyate /

GSP31iskamatu:198: “brahmaṇe brāhmaṇam ālabheta kṣatrāya rājanyaṃ marudbhyo vaiśyaṃ tapase taskaraṃ nārakāya vīrahaṇam“[taittirīyabrāhmaṇa 3 / 4 /

GSP31iskamatu:220: yathā āḍhyam avalokya daridrasya duḥkhaṃ syāt,

GSP31iskamatu:225: tad evam anyonyātiśayāt svarge 'pi duḥkham avyāvṛttam /

GSP31iskamatu:229: kathaṃ punar asau bhavatīty āha --- vyaktāvyaktajñavijñānāt /

GSP31iskamatu:243: ataḥ pradhānasya jaḍasya pravṛttihetur ayam astīti siddhiḥ /

GSP31iskamatu:246: nanv amīṣāṃ katidhā pravibhāga ity atrocyate caturdhā /

GSP31iskamatu:251: mūlaṃ saptānāṃ prakṛtivikṛtīnām ādir ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:255: kāraṇam eva sā na kāryam ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:257: mahadādyās tu sapta prakṛtayo vikṛtayaś ca /
GSP31iskamatu:258: mahān ahaṅkāraḥ pañcatanmātrāṇi ceti sapta prakṛtayo 'nyeṣāṃ kāraṇatayā,
GSP31iskamatu:260: tatra vyaktim āha --- pradhānād buddhir iti vikṛtiḥ,
GSP31iskamatu:266: utpannatvād utpādakatvāc ca saptamāḥ prakṛtayo vikṛtayaś ca /
GSP31iskamatu:268: ṣoḍaśakas tu punar vikāra eva kāryatvāt /
GSP31iskamatu:270: tadvyaktim āha --- vaikṛtikād ahaṅkārād utpannāny ekādaśendriyāṇi tanmātrebhyaḥ pañcamahābhūtānīti
GSP31iskamatu:271: ṣoḍaśako 'yaṃ gaṇo vikāro 'nyasmād utpanno na hi tato 'nyad utpadyata ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:273: puruṣas tu punar na prakṛtir anutpādakatvāt na ca vikṛtir anutpannatvāt /
GSP31iskamatu:274: naivāsau kāraṇaṃ na ca kāryam ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:278: na prakṛtir na ca vikṛtir itibhedāc caturdhā prakṛtivikṛtivibhāgo 'bhihitaḥ // SkMv_3 //
GSP31iskamatu:279: eṣāṃ vyaktāvyaktajñānāṃ prameyāṇāṃ sādhanāya pramāṇāny āha /

GSP31iskamatu:284: akṣam indriyaṃ pratītya yad utpadyate jñānaṃ tat pratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭam ucyate /
GSP31iskamatu:285: yathā śrotrādīnāṃ śabdādayaḥ pañcendriyārthāḥ pañcānāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP31iskamatu:287: yo 'rtho 'munā dṛṣṭena sādhayituṃ na pāryate tatrānumānasyāvakāśaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:291: kam api hetum anvīkṣya tasya hetoḥ paścān mīyata ity anumānam /
GSP31iskamatu:292: yathā dhūmaṃ hetum anvīkṣya mahānasa iva pūrvaṃ vahnidarśanād agner astitvaṃ sādhyata ity anumānam /
GSP31iskamatu:293: pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ yo 'rthaḥ sādhayituṃ na śakyas tatrāptavacanam /
GSP31iskamatu:301: nanv arthāpattiḥ sambhavo 'bhāvaḥ pratibhā aitihyam upamānaṃ cetiprabhṛtīni santi bahūni pramāṇāntarāṇi katham atra trividhaṃ pramāṇam iti saṅgatiḥ
GSP31iskamatu:304: tatra pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkta ity ukte rātrau bhuṅkta ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:306: prastha ity ukte catvāraḥ kuḍavā iti bodhaḥ sambhavaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:309: yathā vrīhiśoṣaṇadarśanān na vṛṣṭo deva iti vṛṣṭer abhāvaṃ sādhayati /
GSP31iskamatu:312: dakṣiṇena tu vindhyasya sahyasya tu yad uttaram /
GSP31iskamatu:313: pṛthivyām ā samudrāyāṃ sa pradeśo manoramaḥ //
GSP31iskamatu:314: ity ukte tatra śobhanā guṇāḥ santīti pratibhotpadyate /
GSP31iskamatu:317: aitihyaṃ yathā --- asmin vaṭe yakṣiṇī prativasati iti janā vadanti ity ukte,
GSP31iskamatu:321: upamānam --- yathā gaus tathā gavaya ity(p.8)
GSP31iskamatu:328: tasmāt triṣv evānyad antarbhavatīti yuktam abhihitaṃ trividhaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP31iskamatu:330: tena pramāṇena kiṃ sādhyam ity āha --- prameyasiddhiḥ pramāṇād dhi /
GSP31iskamatu:331: yasmāt prameyaṃ sakalaṃ pramāṇena pramīyate yathā tulayā candanādi,
GSP31iskamatu:340: tad amīṣāṃ madhye kiñcit pratyakṣeṇānyad anumānenetarad āptānumānābhyāṃ pramīyate /
GSP31iskamatu:341: tasmād ācāryeṇa bhagavatā yuktam abhihitam --- “prameyasiddhiḥ pramāṇād dhi” iti // SkMv_4 //
GSP31iskamatu:342: tatra trividhasya pramāṇasya pṛthak lakṣaṇam upanyasyate /
GSP31iskamatu:344: tal liṅgaliṅgipūrvakam āptaśrutir āptavacanaṃ tu // ISk_5 //
GSP31iskamatu:345: viṣayaṃ viṣayaṃ prati yo 'dhyavasāyo netrādīnām indriyāṇāṃ pañcānāṃ rūpādiṣu pañcasu,
GSP31iskamatu:356: trairūpyaṃ punaḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe sattvaṃ vipakṣe cāsattvam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:366: evaṃ pañcāvayavena vākyena svaniścitārthapratipādanaṃ parārthapratipādanaṃ parārtham anumānam /
GSP31iskamatu:371: nadīpūradarśanād upari vṛṣṭo deva iti vā pratītiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:376: punar yathā --- bahir udyota iti kenāpy uktaṃ,
GSP31iskamatu:380: liṅgena tridaṇḍādidarśanenādṛṣṭo 'pi liṅgī sādhyate nūnam asau parivrāḍ asti yasyedaṃ tridaṇḍam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:384: śrutir vedas tad etad ubhayam āptavacanam /
GSP31iskamatu:385: āptiḥ sākṣādarthaprāptir yathārthopalambhaḥ tayā vartata ity āptaḥ sākṣātkṛtadharmā yathārthāptyā śrutārthagrāhī tad uktam āptavacanam /
GSP31iskamatu:388: jahallakṣaṇājahallakṣaṇā jahadajahallakṣaṇā cetyādi pramāṇaśāstreṣu bahutaraḥ prapañca āste /
GSP31iskamatu:389: tatra prakrāntam eva tāvad abhidhīyate bhagavataḥ kapilasya matam /
GSP31iskamatu:390: āgamo hy āptavacanam āptaṃ doṣakṣayād viduḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:393: pūjitas tadvidhair nityam āpto jñeyaḥ sa tādṛśaḥ //
GSP31iskamatu:394: tad evam etat trividhaṃ pramāṇam // SkMv_5 //
GSP31iskamatu:395: tad evaṃ vyaktāvyaktajñākhyasya pratyakṣāditrividhapramāṇeṣu kena kasya siddhiḥ syāt iti / atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:396: sāmānyatas tu dṛṣṭād atīndriyāṇāṃ pratītir anumānāt /
GSP31iskamatu:397: tasmād api cāsiddhaṃ parokṣam āptāgamāt sādhyam // ISk_6 //
GSP31iskamatu:398: atra pradhānapuruṣāv atīndriyau tayoḥ sāmānyatodṛṣṭād anumānāt siddhiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:399: yasmān mahadādi liṅgaṃ triguṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāryaṃ tatkāraṇam adṛṣṭam apy asti triguṇaṃ ceti sādhyate pradhānam /
GSP31iskamatu:400: na hy asataḥ sadutpattiḥ syād iti /
GSP31iskamatu:401: na ca kāraṇāsadṛśaṃ kāryaṃ syād iti /
GSP31iskamatu:402: vyaktaṃ tu pratyakṣeṇaiva sādhitam iti tadarthe na prayatnaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:403: yasmāj jaḍam api pradhānaṃ prasūtikriyāyāṃ pravartate tasmād asti lohasya calanakriyāśaktihetucumbakavad avaśyaṃ puruṣa iti jñasiddhiḥ // SkMv_6
GSP31iskamatu:404: nanu pratyakṣeṇa yo 'rtho nopalabhyate sa sarvathā nāstīti mataṃ saṅgacchate /
GSP31iskamatu:408: evaṃ pradhānapuruṣau nopalabhyete tasmāt tāv api na sta ity āśaṅkānirāsāyāha ---
GSP31iskamatu:410: saukṣmyād vyavadhānād abhibhavāt samānābhihārāc ca // ISk_7 //
GSP31iskamatu:411: iha loke satām apy arthānām aṣṭadhā nopalabdhiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:412: tathā hi darśayati --- yathā satām api devadattaviṣṇumitrayajñadattānāṃ deśāntaragatānām atidūrān nopalabdhiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:414: yathā vā cakṣur atisāmīpyāt kajjalaṃ nopalabhate /
GSP31iskamatu:418: anavasthitacittau rājānam api yāntaṃ na paśyati /
GSP31iskamatu:424: sūryāditejasābhibhūtānāṃ grahanakṣatratārakādīnām anupalambhāt teṣāṃ kim abhāvaḥ śakyate parikalpayitum /
GSP31iskamatu:425: mudgarāśikuvalayāmalakamauktikakapotādinikurambe kṣiptaṃ samānaṃ yadi nopalabhyate tad avedam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:430: tatra mṛtpiṇḍe ghaṭaḥ prāg utpatter nopalabhyata iti prāgabhāvaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:431: pradhvaṃsābhāvo yathā mudgarābhighātāt pradhvasto ghaṭo nopalabhyate /
GSP31iskamatu:439: evaṃ pradhānapuruṣāv api santau nopalabhyete // SkMv_7 //
GSP31iskamatu:440: tad amīṣāṃ madhye kena hetunemau nopalabhyete / tad ucyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:442: mahadādi tac ca kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ca // ISk_8 //
GSP31iskamatu:443: tasya pradhānasyānupalabdhir anavagamaḥ saukṣmyāt hetor nābhāvāt /
GSP31iskamatu:447: kiṃ tu asti pradhānaṃ nopalabhyate saukṣmyāt paramāṇvādivat /
GSP31iskamatu:451: yathā vaṭadhānyaṃ kāraṇaṃ vaṭaṃ kāryam ālokyānumīyate /
GSP31iskamatu:452: evaṃ sad eva pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ mahadādeḥ sataḥ kāryād anumīyate /
GSP31iskamatu:454: mahadādi mahāna haṅkāraḥ pañcatanmātrāṇi ekādaśendriyāṇi pañca mahābhūtāni ceti trayoviṃśatikam /
GSP31iskamatu:455: etan mahadādi kāryaṃ triguṇaṃ dṛṣṭvānumīyate --- asti pradhānam api triguṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasyedaṃ triguṇaṃ kāryam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:457: tac ca kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ca /
GSP31iskamatu:459: santi te hetavo yair etat pradhānaṃ visadṛśaṃ sadṛśaṃ ca /
GSP31iskamatu:460: yathā loke putraḥ pituḥ sadṛśo visadṛśaḥ syāt yadi rūpeṇa tadā na guṇaiḥ,
GSP31iskamatu:461: yadā guṇais tadā na rūpeṇeti yāvat /
GSP31iskamatu:462: tāṃś ca hetūn upariṣṭād vakṣyāmaḥ // SkMv_8 //
GSP31iskamatu:464: anyat pṛcchāmaḥ --- kim etan mahadādi prāg utpatteḥ pradhāne sat jāyate,
GSP31iskamatu:467: atra vaiśeṣikā vipratipannā asataḥ sad bhavatīti manyante /
GSP31iskamatu:468: mṛtpiṇḍe hi prāg utpatter ghaṭo nāstīti vyavasitāste /
GSP31iskamatu:472: evam anyonyavirodhavādiṣu darśiṣu ko nāma niścayaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:474: tatra tāvat sadasadvādino jīvakāḥ svavacanavirodhenaiva nirastāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:478: atra dṛṣṭānto yathā devadatto mṛto jīvati cetivat /
GSP31iskamatu:479: bauddhānāṃ tu nāsti na ca nāstīti pakṣaparigrahābhāvāt taiḥ saha sañjalpa eva na yujyate /
GSP31iskamatu:480: vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ tu asataḥ sad bhavatīti matapratiṣedhāya ucyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:482: śaktasya śakyakaraṇāt kāraṇabhāvāc ca sat kāryam // ISk_9 //
GSP31iskamatu:483: iha loke sad eva sad bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:490: na cāsti tasmād anumīyate pradhāne prāg utpatter mahadādikam asty eva /
GSP31iskamatu:492: iha loke yo yenārthī sa tadupādānagrahaṇaṃ karoti /
GSP31iskamatu:495: yadi cāsatkāryaṃ syāt tadā dadhyarthī udakasyāpy upādānaṃ kuryāt,
GSP31iskamatu:499: iha loke yad yasmin vidyate tasmād eva tad utpadyate /
GSP31iskamatu:503: sarvataḥ sambhavet tataś ca tṛṇapāṃsuvālukādibhyo rajatasuvarṇamaṇimuktāpravālādayo jāyeran /
GSP31iskamatu:505: tasmāt paśyāmaḥ sarvasambhavābhāvād api mahadādi kāryaṃ pradhāne sad eva sad bhavatīti /
GSP31iskamatu:507: iha loke śaktaḥ śilpī karaṇādikāraṇopādānakālopāyasampannaḥ śakyād eva śakyaṃ karma ārabhate nāśakyam aśakyāt /
GSP31iskamatu:508: tad yathā --- śaktaḥ kumbhakāraḥ śakyād eva mṛtpiṇḍāt śakyadaṇḍacakrasūtrodakavidalatalādibhiḥ sampanno ghaṭaśarāvodañcanādīny ārabhamāṇo dṛṣṭaḥ
GSP31iskamatu:511: yadi punaḥ karaṇaniyamo na syād aśakyād apy aśakyam ārabhyeta /
GSP31iskamatu:515: iha loke yallakṣaṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ syāt /
GSP31iskamatu:518: yadi cāsatkāryaṃ syāt tadā kodravebhyaḥ śālīnām api niṣpattiḥ syāt /
GSP31iskamatu:520: tasmāt kāraṇabhāvād api paśyāmaḥ pradhāne mahadādi kāryam astīti /
GSP31iskamatu:521: sādhitam evam etaiḥ pañcabhir hetubhiḥ sat kāryam /
GSP31iskamatu:522: “sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyaṃ taddhaika āhur asad evedam agra āsīt” ity ārabhya “sattveva somyedam agra āsīt” [chāndogyopaniṣad
GSP31iskamatu:524: tatra yad uktaṃ pūrvasyām āryāyāṃ “prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ca” iti /
GSP31iskamatu:526: hetumad anityam avyāpi sakriyam anekam āśritaṃ liṅgam /
GSP31iskamatu:527: sāvayavaṃ paratantraṃ vyaktaṃ viparītam avyaktam // ISk_10 //
GSP31iskamatu:530: hetur apadeśo nimittaṃ prakṛtiḥ kāraṇam ity anarthāntaram /
GSP31iskamatu:532: tasmāt pradhānena hetunā sakāraṇam idaṃ mahadādibhūtaparyantaṃ trayoviṃśatikaṃ liṅgam /
GSP31iskamatu:533: tathā hi --- mahad buddhitattvaṃ tatpradhānena hetumat /
GSP31iskamatu:535: taiś ca bhūtānīti sarvam evedaṃ parasparahetumat /
GSP31iskamatu:536: atha ca dvividho hetuḥ kārako jñāpakaś ca /
GSP31iskamatu:539: tad dvividhenāpi hetunā yuktaṃ hetumad idaṃ siddham /
GSP31iskamatu:544: tad yathā --- mṛtpiṇḍād utpanno ghaṭaḥ sa cānityo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:546: tasmād anityaṃ tasminn eva ca līyate /
GSP31iskamatu:547: tathā hi --- pradhāne buddhis tasyām ahaṅkāras tasminn indriyāṇi tanmātrāṇi ca teṣu bhūtāni pralayakāle līyante /
GSP31iskamatu:550: yathā pradhānapuruṣau sarvagatau na tathedam ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:551: idaṃ hi yasminn eva pradeśe 'vasthitaṃ tasminn eva vartate /
GSP31iskamatu:553: yasmāt saṃsaraṇakāle mahadādi kāryaṃ sūkṣmaśarīram āśritya saṃsarati tasmāt sakriyam /
GSP31iskamatu:567: yathā pitari jīvati putro na svatantra evaṃ vyaktam /
GSP31iskamatu:587: triguṇam aviveki viṣayaḥ sāmānyam acetana prasavadharmi /
GSP31iskamatu:588: vyaktaṃ tathā pradhānaṃ tadviparītas tathā ca pumān // ISk_11 //
GSP31iskamatu:592: yathā kṛṣṇatantuḥ kāraṇaṃ paṭaḥ kāryam api kṛṣṇam eva bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:593: triguṇena kāryeṇāsya kāraṇam api triguṇaṃ bhavatīti pradhānaṃ sādhyate /
GSP31iskamatu:595: amī guṇā idaṃ vyaktam iti vivektuṃ na pāryate,
GSP31iskamatu:596: tathā pradhānam api idaṃ pradhānaṃ amī guṇā iti na śakyate pṛthak kartum /
GSP31iskamatu:600: tathā pradhānam api sarvapuruṣāṇāṃ kṣetrajñānāṃ bhogyam /
GSP31iskamatu:608: buddher ahaṅkāras tata indriyāṇi tanmātrāṇi ca tebhyo bhūtāni jāyante /
GSP31iskamatu:611: idānīṃ “tadviparītas tathā ca pumān” ity uktaṃ,
GSP31iskamatu:614: tayor yat sādharmyaṃ “triguṇam aviveki viṣayaḥ sāmānyam acetanaṃ prasavadharmi” ity uktam /
GSP31iskamatu:619: vaidharmyam abhidhāya sādharmyam āha --- tathā ca pumān iti /
GSP31iskamatu:620: “hetumad anityam avyāpi sakriyam anekam āśritaṃ liṅgam /
GSP31iskamatu:623: tad yathā vyaktād visadṛśaṃ pradhānaṃ tathā pradhānasadharmā puruṣaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:624: tathā hi ahetumān nityo vyāpī niṣkriya eko 'nāśrito 'liṅgo niravayavaḥ svatantra iti // SkMv_11 //
GSP31iskamatu:625: tatra triguṇa vyaktam avyaktaṃ ca nirguṇaḥ puruṣa ity uktam /
GSP31iskamatu:630: prītiś cāprītiś ca viṣādaś ca te ātmā svarūpaṃ yeṣāṃ guṇānāṃ te bhavanti prītyaprītiviṣādātmakāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:635: yo hi kaścit kvacit prītiṃ labhate tatra ārjavamārdavasatyaśaucahrībuddhikṣamānukampājñānādi ca tat sattvaṃ pratyetavyam /
GSP31iskamatu:638: yo hi kaścit kadācit kvacid aprītim upalabhate tatra dveṣadrohamatsaranindāstambhotkaṇṭhānikṛtivañcanābandhavadhacchedanāni ca tad rajaḥ pratyetavyam
GSP31iskamatu:641: yo hi kaścit kadācit kvacin moham upalabhate,
GSP31iskamatu:644: prakāśaś ca pravṛttiś ca niyamaś ca te arthā yeṣāṃ tathoktāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:650: anyonyābhibhavāś ca anyonyāśrayāś ca anyonyajananāś ca anyonyamithunāś ca yeṣāṃ guṇānām anyonyavṛttayaś ca vidyante tathoktāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:653: anyonyābhibhavāś ceti rajastamasor abhibhavāt śāntā vṛttir utpadyate sattvasya dharmādyā /
GSP31iskamatu:654: sattvatamasor abhibhavād rajaso ghorā vṛttir utpadyate adharmādyā /
GSP31iskamatu:655: sattvarajasor abhibhavāt tamaso mūḍhā vṛttir utpadyate ajñānādyā /
GSP31iskamatu:665: yathā saparikarakumbhakārādhiṣṭhito mṛtpiṇḍo ghaṭaṃ janayati tadvaj janayanti /
GSP31iskamatu:668: evaṃ buddhisthā guṇāḥ sattvarajastamāṃsi parasparaṃ bodhayanti /
GSP31iskamatu:678: yathā kācit strī nayavinayavilāsalīlāvatī bhartur ātmano bandhuvargasya ca prītiṃ janayati /
GSP31iskamatu:680: evaṃ sattvena strībhūtena rajasas tamasaś ca vṛttir janitā /
GSP31iskamatu:685: iha khalu rūpayauvanadākṣiṇyamatisādhutvasmṛtyugrabhāvābhāvalīlāvilāsasampannā strī sattvasya rūpam upadiśyate /
GSP31iskamatu:688: tathā kṣatriyā duḥkhapraharaṇakṛtāparādhāṃ dasyusenām abhinighnatī rajaso rūpam ity upadiśyate /
GSP31iskamatu:689: tena ca dasyubhir upadrutānāṃ dāryamāṇānāṃ sukhāvahā bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:691: tathā ghanāghano mahākṛṣṇo meghas toyādhmāto 'valambī grasamāna iva nabho bhūmiṃ cābhivardhamānaḥ sabalākaḥ savidyudgambhīrastanitas tamaso rūpam ity upadiśyate /
GSP31iskamatu:692: sa ca karṣakāṇāṃ sajjīkṛtabījopakaraṇānāṃ sukho bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:693: sa evānācchāditaśaraṇānām anupārjitabhaktasnehalavaṇānām apraguṇitatṛṇakāṣṭhānāṃ proṣitavadhūnāṃ ca duḥkho mūḍhaś ca /
GSP31iskamatu:698: sattvaṃ laghu prakāśakam iṣṭam upaṣṭambhakaṃ calaṃ ca rajaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:699: guru varaṇakam eva tamaḥ pradīpavac cārthato vṛttiḥ // ISk_13 //
GSP31iskamatu:700: atra yat pūrvasyām āryāyām abhihitaṃ sattvalakṣaṇaṃ tal laghutvaprakāśakalakṣaṇaṃ ca /
GSP31iskamatu:701: yadā sattvam utkaṭaṃ bhavati devadatte tadā laghūny aṅgāni,
GSP31iskamatu:703: tadā mantavyam adya me sattvam utkaṭatvena vartate /
GSP31iskamatu:707: yathā mattavṛṣo vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā uddhato bhavati tadvat /
GSP31iskamatu:709: evaṃ yasmin devadatte yajñadatte vā raja utkaṭaṃ bhavati sa kalahaṃ mṛgayate /
GSP31iskamatu:710: kiṃ cānyat calacittaś ca bhavati grāmaṃ gacchāmi striyaṃ kāmaye tapaḥ karomi ityādi /
GSP31iskamatu:713: tama āha --- guru varaṇakam eva tamaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:714: yad gurutvam āvaraṇatvaṃ cāsti tat tamaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:717: tadānīṃ mantavyam etat tama utkaṭatvena vartata iti /
GSP31iskamatu:719: yat punar abhyadhāyi --- strī kṣatriyā meghaś ceti /
GSP31iskamatu:721: sattvaṃ rajastamasī āśritya svena rūpeṇāṅgāṅgibhāvaṃ gacchati /
GSP31iskamatu:724: parasparaviruddhānāṃ guṇānāṃ katham ekā vṛttir bhavatīty atrāha --- parasparaviruddhāḥ(p.17)
GSP31iskamatu:725: śatravo na hy ekam arthaṃ kurvanti /
GSP31iskamatu:726: ime ca guṇāḥ parasparaviruddhā api puruṣārthaṃ kurvanti /
GSP31iskamatu:732: yathā tailāgnivarttikāsaṃyogāt parasparaviruddhā api padārthāḥ saṃhatya ekam arthaṃ
GSP31iskamatu:733: prakāśarūpaṃ niṣpādayanty evaṃ guṇā api parasparaviruddhāḥ saṃhatya puruṣārthaṃ kurvanti // SkMv_13 //
GSP31iskamatu:735: yad uktaṃ pūrvasyām āryāyāṃ “triguṇam aviveki viṣayaḥ sāmānyam acetanaṃ prasavadharmi /
GSP31iskamatu:736: vyaktam --- “tat katham evaṃ jñāyate 'vyaktam api triguṇatvādiyuktam / atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:739: yo 'py ayam avivekyādir gaṇaḥ prasavadharmyantaḥ sa vyakte 'pi siddho 'vyakte 'pi siddhaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:747: tasmād avivekyādir guṇas traiguṇyād eva siddhaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:749: iha hi yatra tantavas tatraiva paṭaḥ yatra paṭas tatraiva tantavaḥ,
GSP31iskamatu:750: yas tantūn paśyati sa paṭaṃ paśyati,
GSP31iskamatu:751: yo vā paṭaṃ paśyati sa tantūn paśyati /
GSP31iskamatu:752: evam eva tantupaṭayor iva vyaktāvyaktayoḥ sambandhaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:754: yo hi vyaktaṃ paśyati sa cāvyaktam api paśyati /
GSP31iskamatu:755: yo vā yogī pradhānaṃ paśyati sa vyaktam api paśyati /
GSP31iskamatu:759: kāraṇasya guṇāḥ kāraṇaguṇās te ātmā svabhāvo yasya tadbhāvaḥ kāraṇaguṇātmakatvam /
GSP31iskamatu:762: iha loke yadātmakaṃ karaṇaṃ tadātmakam eva kāryam api bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:764: yathā kaṭunimbavṛkṣāt kaṭur eva raso bhavati madhurāc ca madhuro drākṣādirasaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:767: katham evaṃ jñāyate avyaktam avivekyādigaṇena yuktam iti tad evam eva tribhir hetubhiḥ pratipāditam /
GSP31iskamatu:768: atrāha --- iha loke yan na vidyate tan nāsti /
GSP31iskamatu:774: tau kathaṃ hi sta iti gamyate /
GSP31iskamatu:777: evaṃ pradhānapuruṣāv anupalabhyamānāv apy upalabhyete hetubhiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:778: tāṃś ca hetūn upariṣṭād vakṣyāmaḥ // SkMv_14 //
GSP31iskamatu:780: bhedānāṃ parimāṇāt samanvayāc chaktitaḥ pravṛtteś ca /
GSP31iskamatu:784: loke yatra kartāsti tasya parimāṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP31iskamatu:785: yathā kulālaḥ parimitāt mṛtpiṇḍāt parimitam eva ghaṭaṃ kurute prasthagrāhakam āḍhakagrāhakaṃ vā /
GSP31iskamatu:787: ekā buddhir eko 'haṅkāraḥ pañca tanmātrāṇi ekādaśendriyāṇi pañca mahābhūtāni iti trayoviṃśatikam /
GSP31iskamatu:788: evam etat parimitaṃ vyaktaṃ dṛṣṭvānumānena sādhayāmo 'sty asya kāraṇaṃ pradhānaṃ yad vyaktaṃ parimitam utpādayati /
GSP31iskamatu:789: yadi ca pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ na syān niṣparimāṇam idaṃ vyaktaṃ syāt /
GSP31iskamatu:790: asti cāsya parimāṇaṃ tasmād asti pradhānam /
GSP31iskamatu:798: tasmāt samanvayadarśanāt paśyāmo 'sti pradhānaṃ kāraṇam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:800: iha yo yasminn arthe śaktaḥ sa tasminn eva pravartate /
GSP31iskamatu:802: ataḥ sādhayāmaḥ pradhānasyāpy asti śaktir yayā śaktyā vyaktam utpādayati /
GSP31iskamatu:803: sā ca śaktir nirāśrayā na bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:804: tasmād asti pradhānaṃ yatra śaktir avatiṣṭhate /
GSP31iskamatu:809: tad yathā mṛtpiṇḍaḥ kāraṇaṃ ghaṭaḥ kāryam /
GSP31iskamatu:810: sa eva(p.19) hi madhūdakapayaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ dhāraṇe samartho na tu mṛtpiṇḍaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:814: anyac ca avyaktaṃ pradhānaṃ viparītaṃ kāraṇam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:827: prakarṣeṇa dhīyate sthāpyate atrākhilam iti pradhānam /
GSP31iskamatu:829: na hy asata utpattir na ca sato 'bhāvaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:831: iti gītāsu(2 /16) / “sad eva somyedam agra āsīt“[chāndogyopaniṣad 6 / 2 /
GSP31iskamatu:833: tad yathā --- dadhyādayaḥ prāk prasūteḥ kṣīre 'vibhaktāḥ santy eva /
GSP31iskamatu:834: yady asata utpattis tadā kāṣṭhakhaṇḍād api ghaṭādyutpattiḥ syāt /
GSP31iskamatu:836: tasmān mṛtpiṇḍe kāraṇe ghaṭādeḥ sata evotpattir iti samīcīnam /
GSP31iskamatu:837: yathā jalabhūmyor etadrasagandhādivaiśvarūpyam avibhaktam asty eva sthāvarāṇāṃ jaṅgameṣu jaṅgamānāṃ sthāvareṣu /
GSP31iskamatu:838: evaṃ jātyanucchedena sarvaṃ sarvātmakam iti // SkMv_15 //
GSP31iskamatu:839: asti pradhānaṃ yatra mahadādiliṅgam avibhāgaṃ gacchati /
GSP31iskamatu:840: ity evam avaśyambhāvī avibhāgaḥ paścād vibhāgaś cāvirbhavati tat pradhānam / atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:841: kāraṇam asty avyaktaṃ pravartate triguṇataḥ samudayāc ca /
GSP31iskamatu:844: tad evaṃ pañcabhir ebhir hetubhir jñāyate 'sti tatkāraṇam ekam asya jagato 'vyaktaṃ mūlam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:845: atrāha yady ekaṃ pradhānaṃ kathaṃ tarhi anekaṃ kāryam utpādayati /
GSP31iskamatu:846: tathā hi naikas tantuḥ paṭākhyaṃ kāryaṃ janayati /
GSP31iskamatu:847: itthaṃ pradhānam ekam anekaṃ kāryaṃ janayatīti na jāghaṭīti /
GSP31iskamatu:852: yathā gaṅgāyāṃ srotāṃsi samuditāni gaṅgām ārabhante,
GSP31iskamatu:853: yathā vā tantavaḥ samuditāḥ paṭaṃ kurvanti evaṃ sattvarajastamāṃsi trayo guṇāḥ samuditāḥ pradhānasthā vyaktaṃ kurvanti /
GSP31iskamatu:854: atrāha --- iha loke dvividhaṃ kāraṇaṃ pariṇāmakatvād(p.20)
GSP31iskamatu:858: tatra pradhānaṃ kathaṃ kāraṇam ity atrocyate --- pariṇāmataḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:860: yad eva kṣīraṃ tad eva dadhi,
GSP31iskamatu:862: dadhivad vyaktaṃ kṣīravat pradhānam ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:863: yad evāvyaktaṃ tad eva vyaktam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:864: tasmād ucyate pariṇāmataḥ pradhānaṃ kāraṇam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:867: yathā salilam ekaṃ himavad himabhāvena pariṇamati,
GSP31iskamatu:872: atrāha --- ekasmāt pradhānād utpannās trayo lokāḥ kathaṃ viṣamāḥ?
GSP31iskamatu:873: iha ye devās te sukhino manuṣyās te duḥkhinas tiryañco mūḍhāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:874: ekasmāt pradhānād utpannānāṃ trayāṇāṃ lokānāṃ kathaṃ vaiṣamyaṃ mūḍhatvādinety atrocyate --- pratipratiguṇāśrayaviśeṣāt /
GSP31iskamatu:875: tad yathā --- ekarasam antarikṣād jalaṃ patitam /
GSP31iskamatu:876: tac ca medinīṃ prāpya nānārasatāṃ yāti /
GSP31iskamatu:878: evam ime trayo lokā ekasmād api pradhānād utpannā guṇavaiṣamyāt pṛthagbhāvaṃ gatāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:879: yathā deveṣu sattvam utkaṭaṃ tatas te sukhinaḥ,
GSP31iskamatu:881: manuṣyeṣu raja utkaṭaṃ tatas te duḥkhitāḥ,
GSP31iskamatu:883: tiryagyonigateṣu tama utkaṭaṃ tatas te mūḍhāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:885: evam ekasmād utpannānāṃ trayāṇāṃ lokānāṃ vaiṣamyaṃ bhavati // SkMv_16 //
GSP31iskamatu:888: atrāha --- kecid ācāryā iti manyante śarīrendriyabuddhyādivyatirikto nāsti paramātmā / api ca ---
GSP31iskamatu:897: evaṃ śarīrendriyabuddhyādibhiḥ kṣīranīravad ekībhūto 'pi tadvyatirikto 'sti paramātmā puruṣo 'pi /
GSP31iskamatu:898: pradhānavat sūkṣmatvān nopalabhyate iti tadadhigamāya hetur abhidhīyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:905: iha loke ye saṅghātās te parārthā dṛṣṭāḥ paryaṅkarathaśaraṇādayaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:906: evaṃ gātrāṇāṃ mahadādīnāṃ saṅghātaḥ samudāyaḥ parārtha eva /
GSP31iskamatu:907: (tasmād asti nūnam anyonyādhiṣṭhito yadartho 'yaṃ saṅghāta iti saṅgatiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:910: na hi te rathagṛhaparyaṅkādayaḥ kim api svārthaṃ sādhayanti /
GSP31iskamatu:912: kiṃ tv asty asau devadattādir yo 'smin paryaṅke śete rathena gacchati gṛhe nivasatīti /
GSP31iskamatu:914: evam amī mahadādayaś cakṣurādayo na svārthā na ca parasparārthāḥ,
GSP31iskamatu:920: trayo guṇā yasya gaṇasyādau sambhavanti sa triguṇādiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:923: uktaṃ pūrvasyām āryāyāṃ triguṇam avivekītyādi vyaktapradhānasādharmyam /
GSP31iskamatu:929: tad yatheha loke laṅghanaplavanadhāvanasamarthair aśvair yukto rathaḥ sārathinādhiṣṭhitaḥ pravartate /
GSP31iskamatu:930: atha sārathinānadhiṣṭhitaḥ pravartate tataḥ śarīranāśaḥ syāt /
GSP31iskamatu:932: api coktaṃ ṣaṣṭitantre --- “puruṣādhiṣṭhitaṃ pradhānaṃ pravartate” iti /
GSP31iskamatu:933: tataḥ paśyāmo 'sau paramātmā asti puruṣo yenādhiṣṭhitaṃ pradhānaṃ mahadahaṅkāratanmātrendriyabhūtāny utpādayati /
GSP31iskamatu:937: etaiḥ ṣaḍbhī rasair yuktaṃ bhojanaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhoktā sādhyate /
GSP31iskamatu:939: evam idaṃ vyaktāvyaktaṃ dṛṣṭvā sādhayāmo 'sty asau paramātmā puruṣo yasyedaṃ bhoktur vyaktāvyaktaṃ bhogyam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:942: yā tasya pradhānasya pravṛttiḥ sā kaivalyārthā pravṛttiḥ pradhānasyeti // SkMv_17 //
GSP31iskamatu:943: atrāha --- gṛhṇīmas tāvad ebhiḥ pañcabhir adhītair hetubhiḥ śarīravyatirikto 'sau puruṣo 'stīti /
GSP31iskamatu:944: sa kiṃ sarvaśarīreṣv ekaḥ puruṣa āhosvit pratiśarīraṃ bhinnaḥ puruṣa iti /
GSP31iskamatu:945: kutaḥ saṃśaya iti cec codaka ācāryavipratipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:946: iha kecid ācāryā bhedavādina iti manyante --- eko 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ sarvaśarīreṣūpalabhyate maṇisūtravat /
GSP31iskamatu:947: iha rasanāyāṃ yāvanto maṇayas teṣu sarveṣv ekam eva sūtraṃ pravartate /
GSP31iskamatu:948: evaṃ maṇibhūteṣu śarīreṣu kim ekaḥ sūtrabhūtaḥ paramātmā /
GSP31iskamatu:949: āhosvij jalacandravat puruṣa iti eka eva bahuṣu nadīkūpataḍāgādiṣv ivopalabhyate iti /
GSP31iskamatu:950: ataḥ saṃśayaḥ kim ekaḥ puruṣo guṇasūtranyāyena āhosvid bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:951: atrocyate --- bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ katham iti cet tad ucyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:958: yadi punar ekaḥ puruṣaḥ syāt sa eva nīcakulotpannaḥ syāt sa eva utkṛṣṭakulotpannaḥ syāt /
GSP31iskamatu:964: maraṇe 'pi niyamo dṛṣṭo mama bhrātā mṛto mama pitā ca /
GSP31iskamatu:967: iha kaścit kadācin mriyate tadaiva paro jāyate /
GSP31iskamatu:968: yady ekaḥ puruṣaḥ syāt tarhi ekasmin jāyamāne sarve 'pi jāyeran /
GSP31iskamatu:978: ataḥ paśyāmo ya upahatendriyās te anye,
GSP31iskamatu:980: tasmāt pratiniyatakaraṇatvād api paśyāmo 'neke puruṣā iti /
GSP31iskamatu:986: ihaikasya brāhmaṇasya trayaḥ putrāḥ sabrahmacāriṇa ekenaiva ekasyāṃ bhāryāyāṃ jātāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:990: yady eke ātmā syād ekasmin sāttvike rājase tāmase vā sarve tathā syuḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:994: kiṃ khalu kartā puruṣo 'sty āhosvid akarteti /
GSP31iskamatu:997: loke tāvat puruṣo gacchati dhāvati tiṣṭhati śocati,
GSP31iskamatu:1000: vaiśeṣikā api kartā iti mataṃ pratipannāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1004: tasmāc ca viparyāsāt siddhaṃ sākṣitvam asya puruṣasya /
GSP31iskamatu:1005: kaivalyaṃ mādhyasthyaṃ draṣṭṛtvam akartṛbhāvaś ca // ISk_19 //
GSP31iskamatu:1008: tad yathā kaścid yamaniyamarataḥ sāṅkhyayogācāryarato bhikṣur nagare prativasati /
GSP31iskamatu:1009: sa ca janādiṣu prativarṇāśramavihitāsu kriyāsu pravartamānānāṃ tannagaravāsināṃ sākṣimātro bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:1011: tadvad ayaṃ nānāvasthe guṇavimarde vartamāno vaidharmyāt kṣetrajñaḥ sākṣimātraḥ syāt /
GSP31iskamatu:1014: yathāsau bhikṣuḥ kadācin nāgarāṇāṃ vivadatāṃ vaktā bhavati tvayā sādhukṛtam iti tvayāsādhv iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1019: atrāha --- yady akartā tat kiṃ parakṛtānāṃ prayoktā /
GSP31iskamatu:1022: atrodāsīnasya puruṣasya kartṛtvaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ guṇalakṣaṇena // SkMv_19 //
GSP31iskamatu:1023: atrāha --- yady akartā puruṣaḥ adhyavasāyaṃ tarhi kiṃ karoti dharmaṃ kariṣyāmy adharmaṃ ceti /
GSP31iskamatu:1024: yadi guṇā adhyavasāyaṃ kurvanti tarhi teṣāṃ sacetanatvaṃ(p.24) syāt /
GSP31iskamatu:1026: atha puruṣo 'dhyavasāyaṃ kurute tadā tasya kartṛtvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1030: tasmāt tatsaṃyogād acetanaṃ cetanāvad iva liṅgam /
GSP31iskamatu:1031: guṇakartṛtve 'pi tathā karteva bhavaty udāsīnaḥ // ISk_20 //
GSP31iskamatu:1033: tasmāt tatsaṃyogād acetanaṃ mahadādi liṅgam adhyavasāyābhimānasaṅkalpālocanādiṣu vṛttiṣu cetanāvat pravartate /
GSP31iskamatu:1034: ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ --- tad yathā anuṣṇāśīto ghaṭaḥ śītābhir adbhiḥ saṃspṛṣṭaḥ śīto bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:1036: evaṃ mahadādi liṅgam acetanam api bhūtvā cetanāvad bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:1038: yad apy uktam --- lokopacārāt kartā puruṣa iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1039: atra brūmaḥ --- guṇakartṛtve 'pi tathā karteva bhavaty udāsīnaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1041: kecit kila caurā grāmaṃ hṛtvā dravyaṃ gṛhītvā grāmāntaraṃ gacchanti kṛtakāryāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1042: taiḥ saha sārthena śrotriyo brāhmaṇaḥ panthānaṃ gacchati /
GSP31iskamatu:1044: kṛtāparādhais taiḥ saha so 'pi brāhmaṇo gṛhītas tvam api caura iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1045: tad yathāsāv acauras tatsaṃsargadoṣeṇa cauratayā pratītas taiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1046: tathā sattvādayo guṇāḥ kartāras taiḥ saṃyuktaḥ puruṣo 'pi akartāpi kartā bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:1049: atrāha --- tasmāt tatsaṃyogāt iti pradhānapuruṣasaṃyoga iti cet,
GSP31iskamatu:1053: sampātajo dvayor vā saṃyogo yathā dvyaṅgulākāśayoḥ,
GSP31iskamatu:1058: atrocyate --- anyatarakarmajasaṃyogaś ca saṃyogo naiva pradhānapuruṣayor vibhutvāniṣkriyatvāt /
GSP31iskamatu:1062: atrāha --- kas tarhi pradhānapuruṣayoḥ saṃyoga iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1067: paṅgvandhavad ubhayor api saṃyogas tatkṛtaḥ sargaḥ // ISk_21 //
GSP31iskamatu:1069: puruṣaḥ pradhānena saha saṃyujyate suguṇāṃ prakṛtiṃ drakṣyāmy ayam arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1071: asya tapasvinaḥ puruṣasya jñāne vartamānasya kaivalyaṃ kariṣyāmīti /
GSP31iskamatu:1073: yathā rājā puruṣeṇa saṃyujyate praiṣaṇaṃ me kariṣyatīti /
GSP31iskamatu:1074: puruṣo 'pi rājñā saṃyujyate vṛttiṃ me dāsyatīti /
GSP31iskamatu:1076: tathā pradhānapuruṣayor apy arthahetukaḥ sambandhaḥ saṃyogaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1080: yathā kila kaścid andhaḥ sārthena samaṃ pāṭaliputraṃ prasthitaḥ sa ca sārthaś caurair abhihataḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1082: sa ca sarvasvajanavirahita itaś cetaś ca paribhrāmyan panthānam apaśyan samantāc caṅkramamāṇaḥ kenacid vanamadhyasthena paṅgunā dṛṣṭaḥ proktaś ca /
GSP31iskamatu:1083: bho bho andha mā bhaiṣīr ahaṃ paṅgur mārgadarśane kuśalī gantum asamarthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1084: andhena prativacanaṃ proktam --- bhoḥ paṅgo yathā bhavān gamanāśaktas tathāham api na śaknomi draṣṭuṃ,
GSP31iskamatu:1086: tava darśanasāmarthyenāhaṃ bhavantaṃ skandhenādāya gacchāmy evam ubhayor duḥkhaparihāralakṣaṇā kāryasiddhir astu /
GSP31iskamatu:1087: evaṃ tayor yathā svārthalabdhihetukaḥ sambandhaḥ saṃyogas tulyaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1094: evaṃ pradhānam api puruṣasya mokṣaṃ kṛtvā nivartate /
GSP31iskamatu:1103: prakṛter mahāṃs tato 'haṅkāras tasmād gaṇaś ca ṣoḍaśakaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1104: tasmād api ṣoḍaśakāt pañcabhyaḥ pañca bhūtāni // ISk_22 //
GSP31iskamatu:1107: tasyāḥ prakṛter mahān utpadyate prathamaḥ kaścit /
GSP31iskamatu:1119: tasya ime paryāyāḥ --- vaikṛtas taijaso bhūtādir abhimāno 'smitā iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1120: catuḥṣaṣṭivarṇaiḥ parādivaikharīparyantābhidheyair yat kim apy abhidhīyate buddhyā
GSP31iskamatu:1132: tasmād api ṣoḍaśakāt madhye yāni pañca śabdāditanmātrāṇi tebhyaḥ pañca bhūtāny ākāśādīni /
GSP31iskamatu:1137: gandhatanmātrāt pṛthivī ityādikrameṇa pūrvapūrvānupraveśenaikadvitricatuṣpañcaguṇāny ākāśādipṛthvīparyantāni mahābhūtānīti sṛṣṭikramaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1138: ata eva bhūtānām utpattilayāvabodhanāt bha iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1147: vetti vidyām avidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavān iti” //
GSP31iskamatu:1152: tatra mahadādibhūtaparyantam ity etad vyaktaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP31iskamatu:1154: ityādibhiḥ pañcabhir hetubhir vyākhyātam / yad uktam ---
GSP31iskamatu:1156: jaṭī muṇḍī śikhī vāpi mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ” // SkMv_22 //
GSP31iskamatu:1158: tasya mahataḥ kiṃ lakṣaṇam ity atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:1159: adhyavasāyo buddhir dharmo jñānaṃ virāga aiśvaryam /
GSP31iskamatu:1160: sāttvikam etad rūpaṃ tāmasam asmād viparyastam // ISk_23 //
GSP31iskamatu:1162: adhyavasāyo niścayaḥ pratipattiḥ ayaṃ sthāṇur ayaṃ puruṣa iti buddher lakṣaṇam /
GSP31iskamatu:1165: tatra buddheḥ sāttvikaṃ rūpaṃ caturvidhaṃ bhavati dharmo jñānaṃ vairāgyam aiśvaryam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1166: tatra dharmo nāma varṇinām āśramiṇāṃ ca samayāvirodhena yaḥ prokto yamaniyamalakṣaṇaḥ sa dharmaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1170: ebhir yamaniyamair yaḥ sādhyate sa dharmaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1171: dhāraṇārtho dhṛñ ity eṣa dhātuḥ śābdaiḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1173: tatra yā sthāvarajaṅgamānāṃ bhūtānāṃ vāṅmanaḥkāyakarmabhir adrohatā sā ahiṃsā /
GSP31iskamatu:1174: tathā yad bhūtahitam atyantaṃ dṛṣṭaśrutānumitivijñāteṣv artheṣu yathāntaḥkaraṇapratyayopasthitaṃ
GSP31iskamatu:1176: tathā yat sambhrameṣv anyeṣu vātyantikeṣu prayojaneṣu sve sve sthāne samatvād grahaṇasyoparamas tad asteyam /
GSP31iskamatu:1177: tathā strīpuruṣasaṃyoge parasparaliṅgasaṃyoge śabdasparśarasarūpagandheṣu yaḥ saṅgavyudāsaḥ śrotādyuparatiḥ asaṅkalpaś ca manasa uparatiḥ so 'ṣṭāṅgaṃ brahmacaryam /
GSP31iskamatu:1180: brahmabījaṃ retas tac carati na muñcatīti brahmacārī /
GSP31iskamatu:1181: brahma vedaṃ vā guruṇā pradattaṃ caratīti /
GSP31iskamatu:1182: brahmā svayambhūs tasyāyaṃ daṇḍakamaṇḍaludhāraṇādirūpa ākāro brahmavac caratīti vā /
GSP31iskamatu:1183: evam arjanakrayavikrayādikalpanābhedānām anupādānaṃ sarvathā sarvasyāsvīkaraṇam aparigrahaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1185: yaś cendriyāṇām antaḥkaraṇoparamas tac chaucaṃ bāhyaṃ mṛjjalādinā /
GSP31iskamatu:1187: svadharme ca vyavasthānaṃ śaucam etat prakīrtitam” //
GSP31iskamatu:1190: ahany ahani yajñaśeṣāśanārtham etad āhāralāghavaṃ santoṣaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1191: “sa yāṃ prathamām āhutiṃ juhuyāt prāṇāya svāhā“(chāndogyopaniṣad 5 / 19 /
GSP31iskamatu:1192: 1) ity ārabhya “sa ya idam avidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti yathāṅgārān apohya bhasmani hutaṃ(juhuyāt?)
GSP31iskamatu:1200: anādivāsanāvicitrā pratyupasthitaviṣayajālā cāśuddhir nāntareṇa tapaḥ sambhedam āpadyata iti tapasa upādānam /
GSP31iskamatu:1201: tac ca cittaprasādanam abādhamānam āsevyam iti manyante /
GSP31iskamatu:1203: īśvarapraṇidhānaṃ kriyāṇāṃ paramagurāv arpaṇaṃ tatphalasaṃnyāso vā /
GSP31iskamatu:1207: ity amīṣāṃ yamaniyamādīnāṃ sevanāt “ahiṃsāpratiṣṭhāyāṃ tatsannidhau vairatyāgaḥ“(pātañjalayogasūtra 2 /
GSP31iskamatu:1210: 33), “vitarkā hiṃsādayaḥ kṛtakāritānumoditā lobhakrodhamohapūrvakā duḥkhājñānānantaphalā iti pratipakṣabhāvanam“(pātañjalayogasūtra 2 /
GSP31iskamatu:1211: 34)(p.29) evaṃ ca vartamānasya yoginaḥ “sthānyupanimantraṇe saṅgasmayākaraṇaṃ punar aniṣṭaprasaṅgāt“(pātañjalayogasūtra 3 /
GSP31iskamatu:1213: ebhir yamaniyamair vā sādhyate sa dharmo vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1218: anye guṇāḥ sattvarajastamāṃsi anyaḥ puruṣa iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1219: bāhyena jñānena lokopapattir ābhyantareṇa mokṣa iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1221: vairāgyam āha --- arjanarakṣaṇakṣayātṛptihiṃsādidoṣān dṛṣṭvā yo viṣayebhyo viraktas tasya mokṣo nāstīti /
GSP31iskamatu:1222: ābhyantareṇa jñānapūrvakeṇa vairāgyeṇa mokṣo bhavati bāhyena saṃsāra iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1224: aṇimā laghimā garimā mahimā prāptiḥ prākāmyam īśitvaṃ vaśitvaṃ yatrakāmāvasāyitvam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1226: yadā sattvena rajastamasī abhibhūte stas tadā sattvodriktaḥ pumān etān guṇān āpnoti /
GSP31iskamatu:1229: asmāt sāttvikād dharmāder viparyastaṃ viparītam adharmājñānādyaṃ caturdhā buddhe rūpaṃ tāmasam /
GSP31iskamatu:1232: tathā adharmo 'jñānam avairāgyam anaiśvaryam ity aṣṭadhā sāttvikatāmasabhedā buddhiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1233: asyā evam vidhāyā buddher ahaṅkāro jāyate // SkMv_23 //
GSP31iskamatu:1234: idānīm ahaṅkārasya lakṣaṇaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ / tad ucyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:1238: rūpe aham rase aham gandhe aham,
GSP31iskamatu:1241: tasmāt abhimānalakṣaṇād ahaṅkārād dvividhaḥ pravartate sargaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1253: bhūtādes tanmātraḥ sa tāmasas taijasād ubhayam // ISk_25 //
GSP31iskamatu:1255: yadā sattvam utkaṭaṃ bhavati ahaṅkāre tena ca sattvena rajastamasī abhibhūte syātāṃ tadā sāttviko 'haṅkāra ucyate /
GSP31iskamatu:1256: tasya sāttvikasya vaikṛtika iti pūrvācāryaiḥ saṃjñā kṛtā /
GSP31iskamatu:1257: sa vaikṛtiko bhūtvā ahaṅkāra ekādaśendriyāṇi utpādayati /
GSP31iskamatu:1259: tasmād ucyate --- “sāttvika ekādaśakaḥ pravartate vaikṛtād ahaṅkārāt” iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1261: bhūtādes tamobāhulyād gauṇībhūtasattvarajaso bhūtādināmnaḥ pūrvācāryair nirūpitād ahaṅkārāt tanmātraḥ śabdādipañcako gaṇo jāyate /
GSP31iskamatu:1262: abhibhūtasattvatamaso rājasāt taijasābhidhānād ahaṅkārāt pravṛttikarmaṇa ubhayaṃ prakāśātmakam ekādaśendriyakaṃ mohātmakaṃ tanmātrikaṃ cāsīd iti sambandhaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1264: sattvaṃ niṣkriyam ekāki na śaknoty utpādayitum /
GSP31iskamatu:1265: tamaś ca mūḍhatvād akriyam asamarthaṃ vinā rajaḥ sṛṣṭim utpādayitum /
GSP31iskamatu:1266: ata ubhe sattvatamasī sṛṣṭiviṣaye rajasānugṛhīte aindriyakaṃ tānmātrikaṃ ca gaṇadvayaṃ janayata iti tātparyārthaḥ // SkMv_25 //
GSP31iskamatu:1267: tatra kāni buddhīndriyāṇi kāni karmendriyāṇīti? ucyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:1282: upastha ānandaṃ karoti putram utpādayatīty arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1283: evam etāḥ karmendriyāṇāṃ vṛttayo vyākhyātāḥ // SkMv_26 //
GSP31iskamatu:1284: atrāha --- mana indriyaṃ tat kiṃ lakṣaṇam iti / atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:1285: ubhayātmakam atra manaḥ saṅkalpakam indriyaṃ ca sādharmyāt /
GSP31iskamatu:1290: yathā devadatto gopālamadhye sthito gopālatvaṃ kurute mallamadhye sthito mallatvaṃ kurute /
GSP31iskamatu:1291: kasmāt? yasmād buddhīndriyāṇāṃ vṛttiṃ saṅkalpayati karmendriyāṇāṃ ca /
GSP31iskamatu:1296: yasmāt karmendriyāṇi buddhīndriyāṇi ca sāttvikād ahaṅkārād utpadyante,
GSP31iskamatu:1304: atrāha --- ekādaśendriyāṇi kena kṛtāni puruṣeṇa īśvareṇa āhosvit svabhāveneti kuta iyam āśaṅketi cet,
GSP31iskamatu:1307: tataś ca nūnaṃ cetanena puruṣeṇeśvareṇa vā svabhāveneti /
GSP31iskamatu:1309: sattvādayas trayo guṇās te yathā pariṇamanti tasmād guṇapariṇāmaviśeṣād imāny ekādaśendriyāṇi nānā /
GSP31iskamatu:1314: eteṣām eva ekādaśānām indriyāṇi grāhakāṇī bhaviṣyanti /
GSP31iskamatu:1315: (p.32) athaitan nānātvaṃ neśvareṇa na buddhyā nāhaṅkāreṇa na pradhānena na puruṣeṇa na svabhāvena kṛtam,
GSP31iskamatu:1317: yady api uktam acetanānāṃ guṇānāṃ vṛttir ayukteti /
GSP31iskamatu:1325: tasmād acetanā api guṇā ekādaśendriyabhāvena pariṇamanti /
GSP31iskamatu:1326: atrāha --- gṛhṇīmas tāvad ekādaśendriyāṇy ahaṅkārād utpannānīti /
GSP31iskamatu:1328: cakṣur uccaiḥ sanniviṣṭaṃ dūrālokane samarthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP31iskamatu:1329: śiraḥpradeśe śrotraṃ sanniviṣṭaṃ dūrāc śravaṇasamarthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP31iskamatu:1330: tvak śarīrābhyantare bahiś ca sanniviṣṭā nānāsparśagrahaṇasamarthā bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP31iskamatu:1333: evam indriyāṇāṃ nikṣepaḥ puruṣeṇa vā kṛta īśvareṇa vā svabhāvena veti /
GSP31iskamatu:1334: atrocyate --- iha sāṅkhye puruṣeśvarasvabhāvā na kāraṇam /
GSP31iskamatu:1335: kiṃ tarhi --- asminn ahaṅkāre sthitaiḥ sattvarajastamobhis tribhir guṇair nikṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1339: grāhyā ekādaśendriyārthās teṣāṃ bhedād apīndriyāṇāṃ bhedaḥ // SkMv_27 //
GSP31iskamatu:1348: na hi cakṣuḥ śravaṇasamarthaṃ dānādānasamarthaṃ vā // SkMv_28 //
GSP31iskamatu:1349: ata ūrdhvaṃ buddhyahaṅkāramanovṛttiṃ vakṣyāmaḥ / tad ucyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:1350: svālakṣaṇyā vṛttis trayasya saiṣā bhavaty asāmānyā /
GSP31iskamatu:1359: yena yena lakṣaṇenāmī lakṣyante teṣāṃ sa eva vṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1360: evaṃ yā buddhīndriyāṇāṃ na sā karmendriyāṇām /
GSP31iskamatu:1361: yā ca karmendriyāṇāṃ na sā buddhīndriyāṇām /
GSP31iskamatu:1365: saiṣā bhavaty asāmānyā asādhāraṇā evam ukte 'rthāt gamyate sāmānyāpi sādhāraṇāpi vṛttir asti /
GSP31iskamatu:1367: evam indriyāṇām asāmānyā vṛttir ākhyātā kulastrīsaṃsthānīyā /
GSP31iskamatu:1371: prāṇādyā vāyavaḥ pañceti prāṇāpānodānasamānavyānāḥ sarveṣām indriyāṇām sāmānyaṃ kurvanti /
GSP31iskamatu:1372: sa prāṇo nāma yo mukhanāsāntarago bāhye cāsya viṣaye vṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1374: asmin prāṇe yat spandanakarma tat katamena kṛtam ity atrocyate --- trayodaśavidhena karaṇena kṛtam /
GSP31iskamatu:1375: yataś caivaṃ tasmāt prāṇakarma sarvasya karaṇagrāmasya vṛttiḥ sāmānyā /
GSP31iskamatu:1376: api cātra dṛṣṭāntaḥ --- yathā kasmiṃścid rājagṛhe pañjare śukāḥ prativasanti /
GSP31iskamatu:1380: yat pañjarasya pracalanaṃ karma tat sarveṣām śukānāṃ sāmānyam /
GSP31iskamatu:1381: tadvat prāṇe yat spandanakarma tat sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ sāmānyam /
GSP31iskamatu:1384: apānabahulaś ca devadattaḥ sarpaṃ dṛṣṭvā apasarpati eṣo 'pānaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1385: tasminn apāne yat spandanakarma tat sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ sāmānyā vṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1389: aham āḍhyo 'smād āḍhyataraḥ kathaṃ syām ity eṣa udānaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1390: asminn udāne yat spandanakarma tat sāmānyā vṛttiḥ sarvendriyāṇām /
GSP31iskamatu:1391: kiñ cānyat --- hṛdyavasthānaṃ sahabhāvaś ca tena samānaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1392: yo vāyur hṛddeśe vartate sa samānaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1393: tadbahulaś ca ekākī na ramata eṣa samānaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1394: tasmin yat spandanakarma tat sarvendriyāṇāṃ sāmānyavṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1396: ānakhād ākeśāntaṃ śarīraṃ vyāpya anati calatīti vyānaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1397: vyānabahulo devadattaś ca atyantam anyena vinā ramate /
GSP31iskamatu:1398: (p.34) tasmin vyāne yat spandanakarma tat sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ sāmānyavṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1399: tad evaṃ sāmānyakāraṇavṛttiḥ prāṇādyā vāyavo vyākhyātāḥ // SkMv_29 //
GSP31iskamatu:1401: yugapac catuṣṭayasya hi vṛttiḥ kramaśaś ca tasya nirdiṣṭā /
GSP31iskamatu:1402: dṛṣṭe tathāpy adṛṣṭe trayasya tatpūrvikā vṛttiḥ // ISk_30 //
GSP31iskamatu:1403: buddhir ahaṅkāro manaś cakṣur ity etāni catvāri yugapad rūpaṃ paśyanti,
GSP31iskamatu:1405: evaṃ śabdaṃ sparśaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ catvāri yugapad gṛhṇanti /
GSP31iskamatu:1408: kramaśaś ca tasya nirdiṣṭā buddhyahaṅkāramanaścakṣuścatuṣṭayasya kramaśo vṛttir bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:1409: dvāridvāravibhāgopadeśād hrasvakālatvād vibhāgo na śakyate vaktuṃ tato yugapad ity ucyate /
GSP31iskamatu:1412: devadattaḥ panthānaṃ gacchan sthāṇuṃ paśyati tatra tasya saṃśayo bhavati kim ayaṃ sthāṇur uta puruṣa iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1413: tatra sthāṇurūpaṃ paśyati śakuniṃ ca tatrasthaṃ tato 'sya buddhir bhavati sthāṇur ayam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1414: ākuñcanaprasāraṇe karoti tato 'pi puruṣo 'yam iti pratītiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1415: evaṃ buddhyahaṅkāramanaścakṣuṣāṃ kramaśo vṛttir dṛṣṭā cakṣū rūpaṃ paśyati,
GSP31iskamatu:1427: gandhe ghrāṇapūrvikā buddhyahaṅkāramanasāṃ vṛttir iti // SkMv_30 //
GSP31iskamatu:1428: atrāha --- acetanānīndriyāṇi buddhyahaṅkārau manaś ceti kena hetunā svāṃ svāṃ vṛttiṃ pratipadyante ity atrāha ---
GSP31iskamatu:1430: puruṣārtha eva hetur na kenacit kāryate karaṇam // ISk_31 //
GSP31iskamatu:1439: yathā kila caurasenā grāmaṃ hantuṃ gacchati tatra caurasenāpatinā saṅketaḥ(p.35)
GSP31iskamatu:1440: kṛto 'sti yadāhaṃ hā heti bravīmi tadā sarvaiḥ samavāyena praveṣṭavyam /
GSP31iskamatu:1441: yadā punar aham ahā heti bravīmi tadā nirgantavyam /
GSP31iskamatu:1442: etāṃ caurasenāpater ājñām ākūtaṃ jñātvā caurāḥ praviśanti nirgacchanti ca /
GSP31iskamatu:1444: kiṃ svārthaṃ viṣayaṃ pratipadyante āhosvit parārtham ity atrocyate /
GSP31iskamatu:1446: yasmād āha --- puruṣārtha eva hetuḥ puruṣārthaḥ kartavya eva iti guṇānāṃ pravṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1447: tasmād etat trayodaśavidhaṃ karaṇaṃ puruṣārthaḥ pravartayati /
GSP31iskamatu:1448: yad apy uktam --- acetanāni karaṇāni kathaṃ pravartanta iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1449: atra brūmaḥ --- na kenacit kāryate karaṇam /
GSP31iskamatu:1452: yasmāt svayam eva ca trayodaśavidhaṃ karaṇaṃ sve sve viṣaye pravartata iti // SkMv_31 //
GSP31iskamatu:1453: atrāha --- uktaṃ ca bhagavatā na kenacit kāryate karaṇam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1456: kāryaṃ ca tasya daśadhāhāryaṃ dhāryaṃ prakāśyaṃ ca // ISk_32 //
GSP31iskamatu:1457: yad atra karaṇam ity uktaṃ tat trayodaśavidham iti boddhyam /
GSP31iskamatu:1460: buddhyahaṅkārau mana iti etat trayodaśavidhaṃ karaṇam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1461: atrāha --- āhārakaṃ dhārakaṃ prakāśakaṃ ca tad iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1465: atrāha --- kiṃ tad asti yasyāharaṇaṃ dhāraṇaṃ prakāśanaṃ ca kriyate /
GSP31iskamatu:1466: atrocyate --- kāryaṃ ca tasya daśadhāhāryaṃ dhāryaṃ prakāśyaṃ ca /
GSP31iskamatu:1469: ete daśa viṣayāḥ kāryam ity ucyate /
GSP31iskamatu:1470: taṃ daśavidhaṃ viṣayaṃ buddhīndriyaiḥ prakāśitam arthaṃ karmendriyāṇy āharanti dhārayanti ca /
GSP31iskamatu:1471: tad yathā tamasi sthitaṃ pradīpena prakāśitaṃ ghaṭaṃ hasta ādatte dhārayati ca /
GSP31iskamatu:1472: tad evaṃ yathā ghaṭaṃ tathā śeṣāṇy api // SkMv_32 //
GSP31iskamatu:1473: antaḥkaraṇaṃ trividhaṃ daśadhā bāhyaṃ trayasya viṣayākhyam /
GSP31iskamatu:1474: sāmpratakālaṃ bāhyaṃ trikālam ābhyantaraṃ karaṇam // ISk_33 //
GSP31iskamatu:1479: trayasya viṣayākhyaṃ buddhyahaṅkāramanasāṃ trayāṇām antaḥkaraṇānāṃ bāhyaṃ daśavidhaṃ(p.36)
GSP31iskamatu:1482: ābhyantaraṃ trikaṃ svāmibhūtaṃ bāhyaṃ daśavidhaṃ bhṛtyabhūtam ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1484: yad etad bāhyaṃ daśavidhaṃ karaṇam uktaṃ tat sāmpratakālaṃ vartamānaviṣayagrāhakaṃ bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:1487: evaṃ vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthāni vartamāneṣu vacanādeyabhūmimalotsargānandeṣu pravartante nātītābhaviṣyatoḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1488: kiñ cānyat --- trikālam ābhyantaraṃ mano'haṅkārabuddhirūpaṃ karaṇaṃ pravartate /
GSP31iskamatu:1489: buddhir vartamānaṃ ghaṭaṃ buddhyate atītaṃ bhaviṣyantaṃ ca smarati /
GSP31iskamatu:1490: tad yathā --- yudhiṣṭhirabhīmasenāv āstām atītaviṣayagrāhiṇī buddhiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1495: evaṃ mano 'py atītaṃ saṅkalpayati vartamānaṃ bhāvi ca /
GSP31iskamatu:1496: yata evaṃ tasmād ucyate “trikālam ābhyantaraṃ karaṇam” iti // SkMv_33 //
GSP31iskamatu:1497: atrāha --- kāni indriyāṇi saviśeṣaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛhṇanti,
GSP31iskamatu:1500: vāg bhavati śabdaviṣayā śeṣāny api pañcaviṣayāṇi // ISk_34 //
GSP31iskamatu:1501: teṣām karaṇānāṃ madhye yeṣām ayam adhikāro vartate teṣāṃ yāni buddhīndriyāṇi śrotratvakcakṣurjihvāghrāṇāni pañca tāni saviśeṣaṃ gṛhṇanti aviśeṣam api viṣayaṃ gṛhṇanti /
GSP31iskamatu:1502: atrāha --- kasya saviśeṣaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛhṇanti kasya nirviśeṣam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1503: atrocyate śabdasparśarasarūpagandhāḥ pajña devānāṃ tanmātrasaṃjñitā nirviśeṣāḥ kevalasukhalakṣaṇatvāt /
GSP31iskamatu:1504: yasmāt tatra duḥkhamohau na stas tasmān nirviśeṣās te iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1506: viśiṣyante śāntaghoramūḍhatvādineti viśeṣās taiḥ saha saviśeṣāḥ,
GSP31iskamatu:1508: evaṃ śabdādayo manuṣyāṇāṃ saviśeṣāḥ sukhaduḥkhamohayuktā ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1509: devānāṃ tu buddhīndriyāṇi nirviśeṣaṃ sukhātmakaṃ prakāśayanti /
GSP31iskamatu:1512: vāg bhavati śabdaviṣayā śeṣāny api pañca viṣayāṇi /
GSP31iskamatu:1513: tatra devānāṃ vāk pādaṃ pādārdhaṃ ślokam uccārayati /
GSP31iskamatu:1515: ato devānām asmākaṃ ca vāgindriyaṃ tulyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1516: kiṃ cānyat --- śeṣāṇy api pañca viṣayāṇi iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1519: evaṃ pañcalakṣaṇam eva pāṇīndriyaṃ sannikṛṣṭaṃ pañcalakṣaṇaṃ ghaṭaṃ gṛhṇāti /
GSP31iskamatu:1521: evaṃ śabdādipañcalakṣaṇaḥ pādaḥ pañcātmikāyām eva bhuvi viharati /
GSP31iskamatu:1522: evaṃ pañcalakṣaṇe pāyūpasthe api pañcalakṣaṇāv utsargānandau kurutaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1523: tasmāt yuktam abhihitam --- “śeṣāṇy api pañca viṣayāṇi” iti // SkMv_34 //
GSP31iskamatu:1525: sāntaḥkaraṇā buddhiḥ sarvaṃ viṣayam avagāhate yasmāt /
GSP31iskamatu:1526: tasmāt trividhaṃ karaṇaṃ dvāri dvārāṇi śeṣāṇi // ISk_35 //
GSP31iskamatu:1527: sāntaḥkaraṇā antaḥkaraṇe ahaṃmanasī tābhyāṃ saha vartate yā buddhiḥ sā tathoktā /
GSP31iskamatu:1528: sā buddhiḥ sarvaṃ viṣayaṃ niravaśeṣaṃ triṣv api kāleṣu yasmād avagāhate vyāpnoti
GSP31iskamatu:1529: gṛhṇāti śabdādyaṃ pañcavidhaṃ tasmād eva tanmanobuddhyahaṅkāralakṣaṇaṃ trividham
GSP31iskamatu:1532: śeṣāṇi punaḥ dvāri bāhye yāni buddhikarmendriyatayā pratītāni śrotravākprabhṛtīni
GSP31iskamatu:1533: daśa tāni tasyā eva mano'haṅkārayuktāyā buddher viṣayagrahaṇāya dvārāṇi pratīkāny
GSP31iskamatu:1535: tathā etair daśabhir dvāraiḥ sāntaḥkaraṇā buddhir eva viṣayān gṛhṇātīti trividham eva karaṇam ity arthaḥ // SkMv_35 //
GSP31iskamatu:1538: kṛtsnaṃ puruṣasyārthaṃ prakāśya buddhau prayacchanti // ISk_36 //
GSP31iskamatu:1539: ete iti buddhikarmāntaḥkaraṇabhedās trayodeśa pradīpakalpāḥ pradīpatulyāḥ /

GSP31iskamatu:1950: tasyāpi na mokṣa ity eṣā upādānatuṣṭiḥ /

GSP31iskamatu:1955: tasmāj jñānam asādhakaṃ mukteḥ syād iti tāvatā tuṣṭaḥ tasya na mokṣa eṣā bhāgyatuṣṭiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1956: evam etā ātmany adhikṛtya jāyante ity ādhyātmikyaś catasras tuṣṭayaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1961: tatrārjanaṃ nāma viṣayāṇāṃ tadarthaṃ kṛṣipāśupālyādivyavasāyaduḥkham avadhārya tebhya evoparatas tuṣṭiṃ labhate /
GSP31iskamatu:1963: arjitānām api rājacaurādibhyo duḥkhaṃ viṣayāṇāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ kartuṃ tasmān na viṣayaiḥ kāryam ity uparatas tuṣṭiṃ labhate,
GSP31iskamatu:1965: rakṣaṇe 'pi kṛta upabhujyamānās te kṣīyanta iti na taiḥ kāryam ity uparatas tuṣṭiṃ labhate,
GSP31iskamatu:1968: tasmān na taiḥ kāryam ity uparatasyāṣṭamī tuṣṭiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1969: proktānāṃ pratīkāre kṛte 'py arjanādipravṛttena hiṃsām antareṇa bhūtoparodhaṃ vināmī na prāpyante tasmān na taiḥ kāryam ity uparataḥ tuṣṭiṃ labhate /
GSP31iskamatu:1973: (evam etābhis tuṣṭibhir jñānaṃ vinā mokṣo 'stīti kevalena vairāgyeṇa tuṣṭaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:1974: ) āsāṃ navānām api tuṣṭīnāṃ granthāntare saṃjñāntarāṇi /
GSP31iskamatu:1975: tad yathā --- (p.49) ambhaḥ salilam ogho vṛṣṭiḥ tāraṃ sutāraṃ sunetraṃ sumarīcam uttamāmbhasikam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:1980: dānaṃ ca siddhayo 'ṣṭau siddheḥ pūrvo 'ṅkuśas trividhaḥ // ISk_51 //
GSP31iskamatu:1981: tatra ūho nāma yathā kaścic cintayati,
GSP31iskamatu:1985: evam asya cintayato jñānam utpadyate svataḥ śāstrato guruto vā /
GSP31iskamatu:1987: aham anya iti tato mokṣaṃ gacchati /
GSP31iskamatu:1991: tad yathā grāmam ācchidya caurā yānti /
GSP31iskamatu:1995: pathikacauramadhye sādhur api cauraguṇāspṛṣṭo 'pi tadanugāminā cauratayā pratītas tādṛggaṇanāyāṃ (pratītaḥ)
GSP31iskamatu:1996: tadabhijñena pathikena svāmī sambodhito yad ahaṃ sarvaṃ jānāmi,
GSP31iskamatu:1997: amī caurā ayaṃ sādhur eva tatsārthānuvartīti /
GSP31iskamatu:2005: śabdo nāma yathā kasyacit paṭhataḥ (tam asya janaṃ)
GSP31iskamatu:2006: śabdaṃ śrutvānyat pradhānam anyo 'ham iti tanmārgapravṛttiprabuddho mokṣaṃ gacchati /
GSP31iskamatu:2007: evam eṣā dvitīyā siddhiḥ śabdata utpannā /
GSP31iskamatu:2008: kaścid gurūpāsanayā tato 'dhītyāvagamya sakalaṃ jñānam āpnoti,
GSP31iskamatu:2013: yathā kaścid ādāv abhihitādhyātmikādiduḥkhatrayeṇābhibhūto 'sya pratīkārāyohaṃ śabdam
GSP31iskamatu:2014: adhyayanaṃ vā pratipadya jñānam adhigamya mokṣaṃ yātīti duḥkhavighātāya yatrohāditrayam
GSP31iskamatu:2018: tat kenacit pratyupakārānapekṣeṇa suhṛdā tasmāt saṃsārakūpād ujjihīrṣuṇā tadanukūlatayā
GSP31iskamatu:2022: te hi suhṛdas tathopadiśanti suhṛttayā yathā pāṣāṇo 'py avabudhyate / uktaṃ ca ---
GSP31iskamatu:2027: kaścid āvāhanasaṃvāhanabhikṣāpātravastracchatrakamaṇḍaluprabhṛtidānena gurūn ārādhya sāṅkhyam adhigamya mokṣaṃ gacchatīty eṣāṣṭamī siddhir dānādibhir upāyair niṣpannā /

GSP31iskamatu:2035: saptadaśa vadhā buddher evam ekādaśa saptadaśa cāṣṭāviṃśatibhedā aśakter abhidhīyante /

GSP31iskamatu:2045: tatra kiṃ liṅgaṃ pūrvotpannam āhosvit bhāvā ity atrocyate --- liṅgaṃ tāvat sūkṣmaṃ
GSP31iskamatu:2046: tānmātrikaṃ śarīram anādikālotpannaṃ trayodaśavidhena karaṇena saṃyuktaṃ bhāvair
GSP31iskamatu:2049: evaṃ trayodaśavidhakaraṇam āśritya sūkṣmaśarīraṃ tānmātrikaṃ saṃsarati /
GSP31iskamatu:2051: bhāvair adhivāsitam iti bhāvā dharmajñānavairāgyaiśvaryāṇi catvāraḥ sāttvikāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2057: na vinā bhāvair liṅgaṃ na vinā liṅgena bhāvanirvṛttiḥ /

GSP31iskamatu:2059: liṅgena vinā bhāvo na bhavati bhāvaiś ca vinā liṅgaṃ na bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:2060: yathāgninā vinā noṣṇatvam uṣṇatvaṃ vinā nāgniḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2064: yatra liṅgaṃ tatra bhāvā yatra bhāvās tatra liṅgam /
GSP31iskamatu:2068: tasmād dvidhā sargo bhavati jāyate // SkMv_52 //
GSP31iskamatu:2069: atrāha --- kiṃ dvividha eva sargaḥ kiṃ tasmād anyas tṛtīyo 'py asti iti / atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:2070: aṣṭavikalpo daivas tairyagyonaś ca pañcadhā bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:2071: mānuṣyaś caikavidhaḥ samāsato bhautikaḥ sargaḥ // ISk_53 //
GSP31iskamatu:2073: tad yathā --- brāhmaṃ prājāpatyam aindraṃ paitraṃ gāndharvaṃ yākṣaṃ rākṣasaṃ paiśācam ity evam aṣṭavidho devasargaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2079: atrāha --- eteṣu triṣu sthāneṣu kataro guṇa utkaṭatvena vartate ---
GSP31iskamatu:2080: ūrdhvaṃ sattvaviśālas tamoviśālaś ca mūlataḥ sargaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2086: tatrāpi rajastamasī staḥ kiṃ tu sattvasyodriktatā /
GSP31iskamatu:2089: paśvādiṣu tamasa udrekāt paśvādisthāvaraparyanto yasmāt teṣu tama utkaṭatvena vartate tatrāpi gauṇatayā sattvarajasī staḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2097: atrāha --- bhūtasarga utpanno bhāvasargaḥ sampanno liṅgasargaḥ sampanna iti yatra sargāḥ prādhānikā iti pradhānakāryaṃ samāptam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:2098: utpannās trayo lokāḥ pradhānaṃ coparatam utpādya lokān iti teṣu devamanuṣyatiryagyonigateṣu duḥkhaṃ ko 'nubhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:2102: atra jarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpnoti cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ /

GSP31iskamatu:2107: tatra jarākṛtaṃ valīpalitair abhibhūtaḥ kāsaśvāsaiḥ parigṛhīto yaṣṭiviṣṭambhagāmī putrasnuṣādyabhibhūto yad duḥkham anubhavati taj jarākṛtam
GSP31iskamatu:2109: aṣṭavidham aiśvaryam asti yat prāg abhihitam aṇimādi,

GSP31iskamatu:2115: tasmāt tasyaiva vijñānitayā duḥkhaṃ na tu jaḍānāṃ pradhānādīnām /
GSP31iskamatu:2116: tarhi kiyantaṃ kālaṃ puruṣo duḥkham āpnoti /
GSP31iskamatu:2118: yāvan mahadādiliṅgaṃ na nivartate tāvat kālaṃ puruṣo duḥkhabhoktā /
GSP31iskamatu:2119: tasmād duḥkhaṃ samāsena --- saṅkṣepeṇa prāpnoti cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2120: yadā tu tat pratinivartate mahadādiliṅgaṃ jñānotpattyā tato mokṣaṃ prāpnoti /
GSP31iskamatu:2123: yadā pratyekaṃ pradhānamahadahantanmātrendriyabhūtāny anyāni aham anya iti jñānaṃ tadā liṅgābhāvaḥ // SkMv_55 //
GSP31iskamatu:2124: prakṛteḥ kiṃ nimittam ārabhya ity atrocyate ---

GSP31iskamatu:2128: evamādir yaḥ pūrvam upavarṇito liṅgasargo mahadādibhūtaparyantaḥ,
GSP31iskamatu:2130: atrāha --- evaṃ liṅgasargaḥ pradhānena kimarthaṃ kṛta iti?
GSP31iskamatu:2132: puruṣaṃ puruṣaṃ prati vimokṣas tadarthaṃ pratipuruṣavimokṣārtham /
GSP31iskamatu:2139: yathā kaścit svārtham iva mitrārthaṃ karoti tathā svārtham iva pradhānaṃ puruṣārthaṃ karoti /
GSP31iskamatu:2143: ante ca guṇapuruṣāntaropalabdhyā mokṣaṃ kurute // SkMv_56 //
GSP31iskamatu:2144: atrāha --- uktaṃ bhagavatā pradhānaṃ svārtham iva parārtham ārabhate /
GSP31iskamatu:2145: atha ca tvayā pradhānam acetanam uktaṃ tat kathaṃ pravartate /
GSP31iskamatu:2150: yathā tṛṇodakaṃ gavā bhakṣitaṃ pītaṃ ca kṣīrabhāvena pariṇamati,
GSP31iskamatu:2155: puruṣasya vimokṣārthaṃ pravartate tadvad avyaktam // ISk_58 //
GSP31iskamatu:2156: yathā loka iṣṭaviṣayautsukye sati tasya nivṛttyarthaṃ kriyāsu gamanāgamanāsu pravartate kṛtakāryo nivartate /
GSP31iskamatu:2157: tathāvyaktaṃ puruṣasya vimokṣārthaṃ śabdādibhogalakṣaṇaṃ guṇapuruṣāntaropalabdhilakṣaṇaṃ dvividhaṃ puruṣārthaṃ kṛtvā nivartate // SkMv_58 //
GSP31iskamatu:2159: raṅgasya darśayitvā nivartate nartakī yathā nṛtyāt /
GSP31iskamatu:2160: puruṣasya tathātmānaṃ prakāśya vinivartate prakṛtiḥ // ISk_59 //
GSP31iskamatu:2161: yathā nartakī śṛṅgārādirasair hāvabhāvaiś ca nibaddhagītavāditranṛtyāni raṅgasya darśayitvā kṛtakāryā nṛtyān nivartate /
GSP31iskamatu:2163: devamānuṣatiryagrūpāsu yoniṣu sukhaduḥkhamohākṛtiḥ śāntaghoramūḍhaviṣayā satī ātmānaṃ puruṣasya prakāśya nivartate /
GSP31iskamatu:2164: tasyāṃ ca nivṛttāyām asau kevalaḥ puruṣo duḥkhatrayaṃ nānubhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:2168: atrāha --- yathā nartakī nṛtyādibhir upāyair ātmānaṃ prakāśya raṅgād vinivartate,
GSP31iskamatu:2169: evaṃ prakṛtiḥ puruṣasya kair upāyair ātmānaṃ prakāśya vinivartate? atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:2171: guṇavaty aguṇasya satas tasyārtham apārthakaṃ carati // ISk_60 //
GSP31iskamatu:2173: śabdasparśādibhir upakartuṃ śīlam asyāḥ sā tathoktā /
GSP31iskamatu:2176: tasyopakāriṇī prakṛtis tasyopakṛtyāham anyā tvam anya iti nivartate (prakṛtiḥ) /
GSP31iskamatu:2184: yathā kaścid anurakto mitrasuhṛttvam avalambya mitrārtham anuktam api pratyupakāram anapekṣya kurute /

GSP31iskamatu:2186: pumān punaḥ pradhānasya kim api na pratyupakaroti /
GSP31iskamatu:2189: prakṛteḥ sukumārataraṃ na kiñcid astīti me matir bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:2190: yā dṛṣṭāsmīti punar na darśanam upaiti puruṣasya // ISk_61 //
GSP31iskamatu:2192: yatheha snuṣā vrīḍayā svagṛhāntaḥ praviśati ato bravīti iyaṃ viśiṣṭatareti /
GSP31iskamatu:2198: tatra sukumārataratvaṃ varṇayati īśvaraḥ kāraṇam iti kecid ācāryā bravate / uktaṃ ca ---
GSP31iskamatu:2200: īśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ narakam eva vā” //
GSP31iskamatu:2208: mayūrāś citritā yena sa no vṛttiṃ vidhāsyati” //
GSP31iskamatu:2218: yad īśvaraḥ kāraṇaṃ syāt tato nirguṇād īśvarān nirguṇā eva prajāḥ syuḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2224: tasmād yo brūte svabhāvaḥ kāraṇam iti tan mithyā /
GSP31iskamatu:2228: kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti tasmāt kālas tu kāraṇam” //
GSP31iskamatu:2231: vyaktam avyaktaṃ puruṣa iti traya eva padārthāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2233: evaṃ pradhānaṃ hitvā nāsty anyat kāraṇam /
GSP31iskamatu:2234: tatpradhānāvagamaṃ prati yadā puruṣasya samyagjñānam utpadyate tadā tena jñānena dṛṣṭā prakṛtiḥ puruṣasaṅgān nivartate /
GSP31iskamatu:2241: yasmāt sukumārataraṃ pradhānaṃ tasmād ucyate --- prakṛteḥ sukumārataraṃ na kiñcid astīti me matir bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:2243: atrāha --- sā dṛṣṭā puruṣeṇa kathaṃ nivartate prakṛtiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2244: atrocyate --- yā dṛṣṭāsmīti punar na darśanam upaiti puruṣasya /
GSP31iskamatu:2245: yathā kācit kulastrī sādhvī svagṛhadvāri sthitā puruṣeṇa sahasaivāgatena dṛṣṭā sahasaivaṃ
GSP31iskamatu:2246: vrīḍamānā tvaritaṃ gṛhaṃ praviṣṭā sā evaṃ matvā dṛṣṭāham aneneti na punar darśanam upaiti puruṣasya /
GSP31iskamatu:2247: evaṃ prakṛtiḥ paramātmanā puruṣeṇa jñānacakṣuṣā dṛṣṭā savrīḍā kulastrīvan na punar darśanam upaiti puruṣasya /
GSP31iskamatu:2248: tasyāṃ ca nivṛttāyāṃ puruṣo mokṣaṃ gacchati // SkMv_61 //
GSP31iskamatu:2249: atrāha --- loke śiṣṭā vadanti puruṣo baddhaḥ,
GSP31iskamatu:2252: tasmān na badhyate nāpi mucyate nāpi saṃsarati kaścit /
GSP31iskamatu:2253: saṃsarati badhyate mucyate ca nānāśrayā prakṛtiḥ // ISk_62 //
GSP31iskamatu:2258: yasmān na badhyate tasmān na mucyate /
GSP31iskamatu:2266: puruṣaṃ na vidanti ye ta evaṃ vadanti /
GSP31iskamatu:2270: atrāha --- yadi puṃso bandhamokṣasaṃsaraṇāni na syuḥ tarhi kasya bhavanti /
GSP31iskamatu:2271: tad ucyate --- saṃsarati badhyate mucyate ca nānāśrayā prakṛtiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2275: yat tat sargādau sūkṣmaṃ śarīraṃ tānmātrikaṃ prāg uktaṃ trayodaśavidhena karaṇena saṃyuktaṃ trividhena bandhena baddhaṃ saṃsarati /
GSP31iskamatu:2276: sa ca bandhas trividhaḥ pūrvam ākhyātaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2277: tad eva sūkṣmaśarīram utpanne jñāne tridhā bandhān mucyate /
GSP31iskamatu:2278: tasmān mucyate badhyate saṃsarati nānāśrayā prakṛtiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2280: evaṃ yat pradhānaṃ tat sūkṣmaṃ śarīraṃ tat pradhānaṃ prakṛtir ity anarthāntaram /
GSP31iskamatu:2281: tatra yaḥ puṃso bandhamokṣasaṃsaraṇāni brūte sa mūḍhaḥ // SkMv_62 //
GSP31iskamatu:2282: atrāha --- sā prakṛtiḥ kair guṇair ātmānaṃ bandhayati,
GSP31iskamatu:2284: rūpaiḥ saptabhir evaṃ badhnāty ātmānam ātmanā prakṛtiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2285: saiva ca puruṣasyārthaṃ prati vimocayaty ekarūpeṇa // ISk_63 //
GSP31iskamatu:2286: saptabhī rūpair iyam evaṃ prakṛtir dharmādibhir vinā jñānam ātmanātmānaṃ badhnāti /
GSP31iskamatu:2290: evaṃ tattvābhyāsān nāsmi na me nāham ity apariśeṣam /
GSP31iskamatu:2291: aviparyayād viśuddhaṃ kevalam utpadyate jñānam // ISk_64 //
GSP31iskamatu:2293: etāni pañcaviṃśatitattvāni puruṣādyāni bhūtaparyantāni teṣām abhyāsas tattvābhyāsaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2304: viparyayaḥ saṃśayas tadviparīto 'viparyayas tasmād aviparyayād asaṃśayād yathābhūtārthadarśanād viśuddham niravadyam avyāmiśraṃ kevalaṃ jñānam utpadyate prādurbhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:2305: kiṃ jñānam? guṇapuruṣāntaropalabdhirūpam ity arthaḥ // SkMv_64 //
GSP31iskamatu:2306: atrāha --- tena jñānena puruṣaḥ kiṃ karoti / atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:2308: prakṛtiṃ paśyati puruṣaḥ prekṣakavad avasthitaḥ svasthaḥ // ISk_65 //
GSP31iskamatu:2309: yathā kaścit prekṣako raṅgasthito gītavāditranṛtyādibhir vartamānāṃ nartakīṃ svastho nirvikalpaḥ paśyati /
GSP31iskamatu:2310: evaṃ puruṣa ātmakṛtena jñānena tāsu tāsv avasthāsu vartamānāṃ prakṛtiṃ paśyati --- iyaṃ sā prakṛtir yā sarvapurāṇam ātmānaṃ badhnāti /
GSP31iskamatu:2311: prekṣakavat prekṣakeṇa tulyaḥ svasthaḥ svasmin bhāve sthitaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2316: nirvarttitobhayapuruṣaprayojanavaśād yaiḥ saptabhī rūpair dharmādibhir ātmānaṃ badhnāti tebhyo rūpebhyo vinivṛttām /
GSP31iskamatu:2317: yāvaj jñānacakṣuṣā dṛṣṭā prakṛtiḥ puruṣeṇa tathā ca pumān dṛṣṭaḥ // SkMv_65 //
GSP31iskamatu:2318: atrāha --- jñānacakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā prakṛtiṃ puruṣaḥ kiṃ karoti? atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:2319: dṛṣṭā mayety upekṣaka eko dṛṣṭāham ity uparatānyā /
GSP31iskamatu:2320: sati saṃyoge 'pi tayoḥ prayojanaṃ nāsti sargasya // ISk_66 //
GSP31iskamatu:2321: yathemāṃ raṅgagatāṃ nartakīṃ sarvāsv avasthāsu vartamānāṃ dṛṣṭvā viramati raṅgāt prekṣakaḥ dṛṣṭā mayety upekṣaka ekaḥ kevalaḥ śuddhaḥ puruṣaḥ
GSP31iskamatu:2322: tathā prakṛtir api --- “anenāhaṃ dṛṣṭā” iti nivṛttā /
GSP31iskamatu:2323: ekā trailokyasyāpi pradhānakāraṇabhūtā na dvitīyā prakṛtir asti /
GSP31iskamatu:2324: nartaky api --- “aham anena dṛṣṭā” ity uparamate nṛtyāt,
GSP31iskamatu:2325: evaṃ puruṣo 'pi “dṛṣṭā mayeyaṃ jñānacakṣuṣā prakṛtiḥ” iti prekṣakavad uparamate mokṣaṃ gacchatīty arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2326: tathā prakṛtir api dṛṣṭāham aneneti svavyāpārād uparamaty eva /
GSP31iskamatu:2327: atrāha --- puṃprakṛtyoḥ sarvagatatvāt sarvaniṣedho na śakyate vaktum /
GSP31iskamatu:2329: tat katham idaṃ sādhanaṃ samīcīnam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:2330: atrocyate --- sati saṃyoge 'pi tayoḥ prayojanaṃ nāsti sargasyeti /
GSP31iskamatu:2331: yady api pradhānapuruṣayoḥ sarvagatayoḥ saṃyogo bhavaty eva /
GSP31iskamatu:2332: tasmiṃś ca sati sargasambhavas tathāpi nāsau sargaḥ syāt prayojanābhāvāt /
GSP31iskamatu:2339: evaṃ prakṛtipuruṣayos tayoḥ śarīrotpattir nāsti punaḥ ṛṇikadhāriṇakavad yatheha loke
GSP31iskamatu:2340: ṛṇikadhāriṇakau uttamādhamarṇau devadattayajñadattau yo 'smin ṛṇaṃ dhārayati sa uttamarṇas
GSP31iskamatu:2343: tatas tau kṛtaprayojanau parasparam arthena santyaktāv atha tayor bhūyaḥ saṃyogo bhavati /
GSP31iskamatu:2345: yathā vā vṛddhasaṃyogād apatyaṃ na bhavati,
GSP31iskamatu:2347: tathā pradhānapuruṣayoḥ kṛtaprayojanayoḥ prayojanaṃ nāstīti siddham // SkMv_66 //
GSP31iskamatu:2348: kiñ cānyat, yadi puruṣasyotpanne jñāne mokṣas tarhi mama kasmān na bhavati / ata ucyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:2351: yadā puruṣeṇa pañcaviṃśatitattvajñānam adhigataṃ bhavati tadā dharmādīny akāraṇāni prāptāni punarjanmasamarthāni na bhavanti /
GSP31iskamatu:2353: loke bījāny agnidagdhāni na prarohasamarthāni bhavanti /
GSP31iskamatu:2354: dharmo yeṣām ādis tāni dharmādīni teṣām akāraṇānāṃ prāptir akāraṇaprāptiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2356: atrāha --- yadi samyagjñānān mokṣo bhavati tatrācāryasyopadeṣṭuḥ samyagjñānam utpannaṃ kimarthaṃ mokṣaṃ na gato 'sti,
GSP31iskamatu:2357: atha vā tvatprasādāt tajjñānaṃ mamāpi sañjātaṃ kim ahaṃ mokṣaṃ na gacchāmi /
GSP31iskamatu:2359: saṃskāro nāma dharmādharmau nimittaṃ kṛtvā śarīrotpattir bhavati tiryaṅmanuṣyadevādiṣu /
GSP31iskamatu:2361: sa ca saṃskāraḥ phalam adattvā kṣayaṃ na gacchati,
GSP31iskamatu:2362: utpannajñānasyāpi tasmād idaṃ śarīraṃ vināśaṃ yāsyati /
GSP31iskamatu:2365: tasmāt hetor utpannajñānasyāpi dharmādharmavaśāt tiṣṭhati śarīram /
GSP31iskamatu:2368: yathā kulālaś cakraṃ bhramayati ghaṭaṃ kariṣyāmīti /
GSP31iskamatu:2369: sa kulālo ghaṭaṃ kṛtvā yathā svastho bhavati,
GSP31iskamatu:2373: evam eva pūrvakṛtayor dharmādharmayor balavattvād durbalatvāj jñānasya,
GSP31iskamatu:2374: utpanne 'pi jñāne vidvāṃs tiṣṭhati saṃskāravaśāc cakrabhramavad dhṛtaśarīraḥ // SkMv_67 //
GSP31iskamatu:2375: atrāha --- utpannajñānaḥ phalanirapekṣaṃ karma nirbījaṃ kurvan na deham ārabhate,
GSP31iskamatu:2376: ārabdhaphalaṃ yāvat janmadāyi “nābhuktaṃ kṣīyate karma” “avaśyam eva bhoktavyaṃ kṛtam” iti kṣapayan,
GSP31iskamatu:2380: utpanne jñāne 'pi kadā vidvān mokṣaṃ gacchatīti? atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:2382: aikāntikam ātyantikam ubhayaṃ kaivalyam āpnoti // ISk_68 //
GSP31iskamatu:2383: tad evaṃ sati śarīrabhede dehanāśe prāpta āyāta ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2389: yadā pūrvakṛtayor dharmādharmayoḥ kṣayo bhavati tadā śarīraṃ bhidyate /
GSP31iskamatu:2390: tasmiṃś ca śarīre bhinne pūrvoktena jñānena śarīraṃ pradhānākhyaṃ kāraṇam aviśeṣamayaṃ tānmātrikaṃ sargādāv utpannaṃ tan nivartate /
GSP31iskamatu:2391: iha śarīre yat pārthivaṃ tat prthivīṃ praviśati /
GSP31iskamatu:2396: evam ayaṃ vidvān tasmin śarīre bhinne --- aikāntikam ātyantikam ubhayaṃ kaivalyam āpnoti /
GSP31iskamatu:2397: aikāntikam avaśyambhāvitvād ātyantikam apunarāvṛttitvāt sarvathety arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2399: na ca nivṛtte roge punaḥ sambhaved ity ubhayodāharaṇam aikāntikātyantikayoḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2400: ittham ekāntātyantas tāpatrayasyābhāvād uparamād anutpatteḥ kaivalyaṃ mokṣa ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2402: atrāha --- kiṃprayojanam idaṃ jñānam ucyate / atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:2405: yaś cāsau puruṣārtho mokṣas tadarthaṃ puruṣavimokṣārthaṃ jñānam idam iti /
GSP31iskamatu:2406: yad etat pūrvavarṇitaṃ jñānaṃ etad guhyaṃ durvijñeyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2407: paramarṣiṇā kapilena samākhyātaṃ kathitam ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2409: atrocyate --- sthityutpattipralayāḥ tatra devādīnām aṣṭau sthānāni bhavanti /
GSP31iskamatu:2423: atrāha --- yad etad bhagavatā vyākhyātaṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvajñānam,
GSP31iskamatu:2425: etat pavitryam agryaṃ munir āsuraye 'nukampayā pradadau /
GSP31iskamatu:2426: āsurir api pañcaśikhāya tena ca bahulīkṛtaṃ tantram // ISk_70 //
GSP31iskamatu:2430: yasmān narakapretatiryagyoniṣu patanāt trāyate tasmāt pavitram /
GSP31iskamatu:2432: vedapurāṇabhāratam anvādibhyo 'pi dharmaśāstrebhya etat pañcaviṃśatitattvajñānam uttamam /
GSP31iskamatu:2436: munir bhagavān kapilaḥ āsurisagotrāya brāhmaṇāya varṣasahasrayājine 'dhikāritām avagamya (asmai) pradadau /
GSP31iskamatu:2438: andhe tamasy ajñāne 'yaṃ tapasvī vartata ity utpannayānukampayā /
GSP31iskamatu:2440: bhagavān bhūtānāṃ gatim āgatiṃ ca vidann anati calatīti bhagavān kapilaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2442: tad eva jñānaṃ bhūya āsurisagotro 'nukampayā pañcaśikhāya provāca /
GSP31iskamatu:2450: ṣaṣṭipadārthā yasmin śāstre tantryante tat ṣaṣṭitantram /
GSP31iskamatu:2452: tena īśvarakṛṣṇena vistaragranthagrahaṇabhīruṇā hitārthaṃ ṣaṣṭitantram atisaṅkṣiptam / tad āha ---
GSP31iskamatu:2454: saṅkṣiptam āryamatinā samyag vijñāya siddhāntam // ISk_71 //
GSP31iskamatu:2460: tad eva ṣaṣṭitantram āryābhiḥ saṅkṣiptam āryamatinā vistīrṇamatinā samyag vijñāya siddhāntam kāryakāraṇasiddhasya śarīrasyānto 'punarbhāvo mokṣas tasya tādātmyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2461: tatisiddhasya śarīrasya sūkṣmasya tānmātrikasya sargādibhavasyānto mūrtināśa iti vā /
GSP31iskamatu:2463: saptatyāṃ kila yo 'rthās te 'rthāḥ kṛtsnasya ṣaṣṭitantrasya /
GSP31iskamatu:2465: ye ṣaṣṭitantre padārthā abhihitās te saptatyāṃ vyākhyātāḥ kathitāḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2467: “bhedas tamaso 'ṣṭavidha” iti āryāyāṃ “pañca viparyayabhedā” ity atra cābhihitā ity ete pañcāśat pratyayāḥ ime cānye daśa maulikāḥ / tathā hi
GSP31iskamatu:2468: astitvam ekatvam athārthavattvaṃ pārārthyam anyatvam atho nivṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskamatu:2469: yogo viyogo bahavaḥ pumāṃsaḥ sthitiḥ śarīrasya ca śeṣavṛttiḥ //
GSP31iskamatu:2470: tatra “bhedānāṃ parimāṇāt” ity etaiḥ pañcabhir hetubhiḥ pradhānāstitvam ekatvam arthavattvaṃ ca siddham /
GSP31iskamatu:2476: navadhā tuṣṭiḥ aṣṭadhā siddhir iti pañcāśat /
GSP31iskamatu:2481: pareṇa saha vādaḥ paravādaḥ tena varjitāś ca /
GSP31iskamatu:2483: atrāha --- katham etad alpagranthaṃ śāstraṃ kṛtsnasya vācakaṃ bhaviṣyati? atrocyate ---
GSP31iskamatu:2484: tasmāt samāsadṛṣṭaṃ śāstram idaṃ nārthataś ca parihīnam /
GSP31iskamatu:2485: tantrasya ca bṛhanmūrter darpaṇasaṅkrāntam iva bimbam // ISk_73 //
GSP31iskamatu:2491: kartā bhoktā bhojyaṃ mokṣaś cātra cintyate /
GSP31iskamatu:2497: yathā svalpe 'pi darpaṇe mahato rūpasya nirūpaṇaṃ syāt /
GSP31iskamatu:2498: evam alpaśāstre ṣaṣṭitantrasya kṛtsnasyāpi vyaktir abhihitety arthaḥ // SkMv_73 //
GSP31iskamatu:2499: ity ācāryeśvarakṛṣṇaproktāyāḥ sāṅkhyasaptatyā vṛttir ācāryamāṭharakṛtiḥ samāptā /
